explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是Claudin 18.2靶向CAR-T细胞疗法在胃癌治疗中的应用以及相关的毒性问题。论文建立了一个体内模型来模拟CAR-T细胞疗法引起的胃粘膜损伤，并探讨了减轻这种毒性的策略，例如使用AND-gate逻辑方法。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析，没有直接关联。
authors: Filippo Birocchi;Antonio J. Almazan;Aiyana Parker;Amanda A. Bouffard;Sadie Goncalves;Christopher Kelly;Jessica Frank;Mark B. Leick;Nicholas J. Haradhvala;Shaw Kagawa;Gad Getz;Giulia Escobar;Diego Salas-Benito;Adele Mucci;Trisha R. Berger;Marcela V. Maus
title: On-target off-tumor toxicity of claudin18.2-directed CAR-T cells in preclinical models
abstract:
Promising clinical activity of Claudin (CLDN) 18.2-directed CAR-T cell therapy in patients with gastric cancer has been recently reported, however gastrointestinal toxicities have also been described. Here the authors recapitulate the on-target off-tumor toxicity of CLDN18.2-directed CAR-T cells due to gastric mucosa damage in preclinical models, suggesting an AND-gate strategy targeting CLDN18.2 and mesothelin to overcome CAR-T cell toxicity 
 Claudin 18.2 (CLDN18.2)-targeted CAR-T cell therapies have shown promising clinical efficacy in gastric cancer. However, early-phase trials have reported gastrointestinal adverse events due to on-target off-tumor recognition of CLDN18.2 in the gastric mucosa. By leveraging shared CLDN18.2 epitopes and expression in humans and mice, we establish an in vivo model that replicates the on-target off-tumor toxicity of CLDN18.2 CAR-T. Our findings confirm that this toxicity is independent of the CAR construct’s design, co-stimulatory domain, and tumor model. Additionally, we demonstrate the utility of this model in testing strategies to mitigate on-target toxicity, such as Boolean-logic AND-gate approaches. Our results offer insights into the use of mouse models that recapitulate on-target off-tumor toxicities, with the caveat that although we are often concerned that models will undercall toxicities in humans, they may also overcall the incidence and severity of toxicities, prematurely discarding promising therapeutic agents from further clinical development. Promising clinical activity of Claudin (CLDN) 18.2-directed CAR-T cell therapy in patients with gastric cancer has been recently reported, however gastrointestinal toxicities have also been described. Here the authors recapitulate the on-target off-tumor toxicity of CLDN18.2-directed CAR-T cells due to gastric mucosa damage in preclinical models, suggesting an AND-gate strategy targeting CLDN18.2 and mesothelin to overcome CAR-T cell toxicity

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注的是Claudin 18.2（CLDN18.2）靶向免疫疗法在胃肠道癌症治疗中的应用，以及由此产生的脱靶毒性问题。研究重点在于开发和评估具有不同亲和力的CAR-T细胞，以降低脱靶毒性，同时保持抗肿瘤效果。该研究与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Elizabeth J. Carstens;Kazuki Takahashi;Naoya Sakamoto;Martina De Vizio;Micaela Morgado;Shahryar Khoshtinat Nikkhoi;Abhishek Mangipudi;Canh Hiep Nguyen;Tate Weltzin;Izuma Nakayama;Qiang Lv;Jue Zeng;Cui Nie;Changjing Deng;Xiaoxiao Wang;Lile Liu;Samuel J. Klempner;Anusuya Ramasubramanian;Jonathan A. Nowak;Andrew J. Aguirre;Kohei Shitara;Eric L. Smith
title: Modeling and addressing on-target/off-tumor toxicity of claudin 18.2 targeted immunotherapies
abstract:
Claudin 18.2 (CLDN18.2) has emerged as a target for gastrointestinal cancer, however, on-target/off-tumor toxicities have been also reported. Here, after reporting evidence of erosive gastritis in patients treated with CLDN18.2 targeted immunotherapies, the authors develop and characterize CLDN18.2 fully-human VH-only single domain CARs, showing that a lower affinity CAR mitigates on-target/off-tumor toxicity while preserving anti-tumor efficacy in gastric cancer models. 
 Successfully extending immunotherapies to solid tumors involves addressing several key challenges, importantly the “antigen dilemma”, the expression of a solid tumor target antigen on the normal tissue of tumor origin. Claudin 18.2 (CLDN18.2) has emerged as an important target for upper gastrointestinal (GI) cancer therapies (such as Zolbetuximab, a naked antibody, recently approved; or CT041, a second-generation chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cell therapy with promising clinical data). However, GI toxicities are reported from clinical use of both Zolbetuximab and CT041. Here, we describe clinical Zolbetuximab treatment associated cases of gastric erosive lesions. We also demonstrate and characterize on-target/off-tumor gastric toxicity targeting CLDN18.2 in a preclinical mouse model of CT041-scFv derived CAR T cell therapy. By developing CLDN18.2 fully-human VH-only single domain CARs, we demonstrate that on-target/off-tumor toxicity inversely correlates with affinity of the binder, and that a lower affinity CAR may widen the therapeutic window for CLDN18.2 by decreasing on-target/off-tumor toxicity while preserving efficacy. Claudin 18.2 (CLDN18.2) has emerged as a target for gastrointestinal cancer, however, on-target/off-tumor toxicities have been also reported. Here, after reporting evidence of erosive gastritis in patients treated with CLDN18.2 targeted immunotherapies, the authors develop and characterize CLDN18.2 fully-human VH-only single domain CARs, showing that a lower affinity CAR mitigates on-target/off-tumor toxicity while preserving anti-tumor efficacy in gastric cancer models.

explanation: 该研究主要关注南极罗斯海的浮游植物动态，利用卫星数据和模型分析了浮游植物的时空分布模式及其环境驱动因素。虽然使用了卫星数据，但研究重点是海洋生态系统，而非大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。研究侧重于风、海冰等因素对浮游植物的影响，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Graça S. Nunes;Afonso Ferreira;Ana C. Brito
title: Long-term satellite data reveals complex phytoplankton dynamics in the Ross Sea, Antarctica
abstract:
Phytoplankton dynamics in the Ross Sea are primarily controlled by wind in the open ocean and by both sea ice and wind at the coast, according to analysis of satellite and model data. 
 The Ross Sea (Southern Ocean) hosts diverse marine ecosystems like polynyas and marginal ice zones. In recent decades, multiple environmental changes (e.g., water temperature increase, sea ice retreat) have affected local biological communities, including phytoplankton. These microscopic organisms support Antarctic food webs and contribute to global carbon sequestration. Here, we analyse 24-years (1998–2021) of satellite and model data to understand spatial-temporal phytoplankton patterns and their environmental drivers. Using a clustering analysis, we identified three subregions with distinct phytoplankton patterns. The oceanic subregion, phytoplankton showed lower biomass and longer-lasting blooms driven mainly by winds. The coastal subregion, where polynyas occur, had high biomass and short blooms primarily influenced by sea ice and wind. The intermediate subregion exhibited variable blooms characteristics linked to sea ice dynamics. Our findings highlight the role of physical drivers in shaping phytoplankton variability and underscore the importance of long-term monitoring for understanding ecosystem responses to environmental change. 
                
                  
                
               Phytoplankton dynamics in the Ross Sea are primarily controlled by wind in the open ocean and by both sea ice and wind at the coast, according to analysis of satellite and model data.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究意大利Campi Flegrei火山口的火山构造断层的形成和演化过程。它分析了2019-2024年间的地震活动数据，发现自2023年以来，地震活动逐渐集中在一个特定的平面上，表明该地区正在形成一个扩张性的火山构造断层。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要关注火山活动和地质构造。
authors: G. Giordano;G. Alfonsi;F. Salvini;F. Bianco;C. Chiarabba;M. Di Vito;A. Tramelli
title: Birth and growth of a volcanotectonic fault during the current volcanic unrest at Campi Flegrei caldera (Italy)
abstract:
Spatial analysis of seismicity within the Campi Flegrei caldera suggests it has become progressively clustered since 2023 around a central plane which is consistent with the development of an extensional volcanotectonic fault 
 The ongoing volcanic unrest at the highly populated Campi Flegrei caldera is accompanied by incremental seismic activity, ground uplift and geochemical anomalies that are raising severe public concern. Here we apply an unsupervised least root square method and a tailored Monte Carlo approach to the 2019-2024 earthquake hypocenter locations and show that since 2023 seismicity has progressively clustered along a preferential N249° ± 4°, 53° ± 1°plane near the center of the caldera, concentrating more than 50% of seismic events and most of the released seismic energy. This clustering is evidence for an internal process that drives the transition from diffuse micro-seismicity to the development of an extensional volcanotectonic fault in its initial stages. The nucleation (or reactivation) of this fault suggests that caldera rocks are experiencing conditions for critical failure and may have overcome elastic deformation resulted, until 2023, in an almost perfect axisymmetric uplift, thus representing an important change for volcanic and related hazards evaluation at Campi Flegrei. Spatial analysis of seismicity within the Campi Flegrei caldera suggests it has become progressively clustered since 2023 around a central plane which is consistent with the development of an extensional volcanotectonic fault

explanation: 该论文研究海洋酸化对大型藻类群落光合作用的影响，重点是评估高浓度二氧化碳环境对大型藻类群落的影响。研究方法是利用火山二氧化碳喷口作为海洋酸化的天然类似物，通过水下实验测量不同二氧化碳浓度下大型藻类群落的光合作用速率。研究结果表明，尽管高二氧化碳浓度会改变藻类群落的组成，但对群落的净光合作用影响不大。因此，该研究主要关注海洋生态系统和生物地球化学循环，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Shigeki Wada;Shingo Kurosawa;Sylvain Agostini;Ben P. Harvey;Yuhi Satoh;Marco Milazzo;Jason M. Hall-Spencer
title: Elevated carbon dioxide does not increase macroalgal community photosynthesis
abstract:
Ocean acidification affects macroalgal community composition but does not enhance photosynthetic activity, according to chamber experiments using volcanic vents as an analogue for ocean acidification. 
 Ocean acidification, driven by rising atmospheric carbon dioxide levels, has impacts on marine ecosystems. While elevated carbon dioxide concentrations have the potential to enhance Blue Carbon fixation and storage, the response of community photosynthesis in macroalgal-dominated ecosystems remains poorly understood. Here, we investigated the effects of elevated carbon dioxide on macroalgal communities using volcanic carbon dioxide vents as a natural analogue of ocean acidification. Net community photosynthesis was assessed using chambers positioned on the seafloor as well as water mass dynamics monitoring. Despite a shift in algal community composition, only minimal differences in net community photosynthesis were observed between reference and high carbon dioxide sites. The high carbon dioxide site had a lower abundance of algal species with carbon dioxide concentrating mechanisms, based on δ13C isotope measurements. Carbon dioxide concentrating mechanisms facilitate photosynthesis under present-day levels of carbon dioxide in seawater, resulting in a negligible effect of elevated carbon dioxide on macroalgal community photosynthesis. These results challenge the assumption that ocean acidification will enhance Blue Carbon uptake and storage, necessitating a reevaluation of this perspective. Ocean acidification affects macroalgal community composition but does not enhance photosynthetic activity, according to chamber experiments using volcanic vents as an analogue for ocean acidification.

explanation: 该论文主要关注植被冠层的结构和生理动态，通过开发一种自动化的超光谱系统，同时监测方向性和半球视几何下的高光谱反射率和太阳诱导叶绿素荧光。研究重点在于评估植被的反射率和荧光，并分析不同观测几何角度对季节性变化的影响。虽然使用了高光谱遥感技术，但其应用主要集中在植被研究上，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
topic_words: ['hyperspectral reflectance', 'sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence', 'canopy structure', 'vegetation phenology', 'canopy density']
authors: Jeongho Lee;Youngryel Ryu;Jongmin Kim;Benjamin Dechant;Sangjun Lee;Joongbin Lim
title: Development of an automated hyperspectral system to monitor hyperspectral reflectance and sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence with directional and hemispheric view geometries simultaneously
abstract:
•Rotating prism system enables SIF and reflectance sensing in two view geometries •Quality control and radiometric tests confirm robust system performance •Seasonal SIF and reflectance differ by view geometries in rice and forest sites 
 Simultaneous observations of directional and hemispherical reflectance and emission are valuable to understand canopy structural and physiological dynamics. However, employing both observation geometries concurrently to measure either reflectance or sun-induced chlorophyll fluorescence (SIF) remains challenging and therefore has rarely been explored with continuous observations. Here, we designed and implemented the enhanced RotaPrism system, an automated instrument that integrates a hyperspectral sensor for reflectance measurements and a hyperspectral sensor with much higher spectral resolution for SIF retrieval, enabling monitoring of both hemispherical and directional viewing geometries. We installed this system at a rice paddy and a mixed forest site, collecting spectral data continuously throughout the growing season. We assessed instrumental uncertainty through quality control protocols designed for our rotating system and evaluated radiometric uncertainty by analyzing radiometric consistency between the two sensors. Quality control metrics showed high pass rates, demonstrating the reliability of our system. The two spectrometers maintained high consistency in spectral data throughout the growing season. Our system revealed notable differences between the two viewing geometries at both sites regarding the seasonal variations of spectral reflectance and SIF, likely influenced by differences in canopy structure and spatial heterogeneity of spectral signals. Specifically, hemispherical measurements captured integrated canopy-scale responses including both sunlit and shaded components, while directional observations were more sensitive to the sunlit portion of the canopy. The relative difference between hemispherical and directional measurements varied systematically with vegetation phenology and canopy density. Our findings underscore the reliability and stability of the system for continuous monitoring of vegetation spectral variations using the two geometric view configurations, supporting potential applications in canopy photosynthesis assessment and hyperspectral satellite validations.

explanation: 该论文主要研究使用L波段InSAR技术绘制热带湿地中被淹没植被的地图，重点在于湿地水文动态的监测。它侧重于开发一种自动化的InSAR工作流程，结合干涉条纹检测和局部相位均匀性分析，以生成概率性的淹没植被地图。研究区域是哥伦比亚的阿特拉托洪泛区，使用ALOS PALSAR-1 L波段图像对进行分析。虽然该研究使用了卫星数据（SAR），但其主要应用领域是湿地生态和水文研究，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析。
authors: Clara Hübinger;Etienne Fluet-Chouinard;Daniel Escobar;Fernando Jaramillo
title: Exploring the potential of using L-band InSAR for mapping flooded vegetation in tropical wetlands
abstract:
•First standardized workflow for mapping flooded vegetation using InSAR. •Detects inundation under canopy, even where volume, not double-bounce, dominates. •Potentially scalable approach for monitoring tropical wetland water dynamics. 
 Wetlands play a critical role in the global water and carbon cycles, yet monitoring their water extent remains difficult, particularly beneath dense vegetation. SAR-based techniques such as backscatter thresholding are limited by complex scattering mechanisms, while fully polarimetric SAR (PolSAR) data capable of detecting double-bounce scattering is scarce. To address these challenges, this study evaluates the potential of Interferometric SAR (InSAR) for mapping water surfaces beneath vegetation using the Atrato floodplain in Colombia as a case study. We develop an automated workflow combining InSAR fringe detection with local phase homogeneity analysis to generate probabilistic flooded vegetation maps. Applied to ALOS PALSAR-1 L-band image pairs from 2007 to 2011, the workflow captures seasonal fluctuations in flooded extent ranging from 500 to 1500 km2. When compared to other L-band SAR inundation products, the InSAR-based maps identify broader flooded areas, with ∼70 % agreement in pairwise comparisons. Furthermore, around 84 % of detections align with existing wetland inventories and seasonal changes in water extent are found to follow terrestrial water storage anomalies. Finally, the PolSAR analysis shows that InSAR can complement backscatter-based methods by detecting inundation in areas with weak double-bounce signals. These findings suggest that combining InSAR with backscatter-based methods can improve detection of flooded vegetation, which is particularly relevant given that the new NISAR mission will provide frequent global L-band observations.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用遥感技术校正城市地区地表温度（LST）的观测偏差。它提出了一种新的角度校正框架，用于提高MODIS LST数据在城市环境中的精度。该方法结合了几何模型和温度循环模型，以解决多角度观测中的时间不匹配问题，并模拟城市几何结构引起的热各向异性变化。虽然该研究使用了卫星观测数据（MODIS），但其重点在于地表温度的反演和校正，而非直接的大气环境遥感，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。因此，它与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
topic_words: ['Land Surface Temperature (LST)', 'MODIS', 'Urban Heat Island', 'Thermal Anisotropy', 'Geometric Modeling']
authors: Jiangtao Qin;Dandan Wang;Gaijing Chang;Xue Li
title: Correcting angular effects on MODIS LST in urban areas using an enhanced time-evolving parametric geometric model
abstract:
•An advanced angular correction framework was proposed for MODIS LST in urban areas. •The proposed model resolves temporal mismatches in multi-angle observations. •The model simulates urban thermal anisotropy variations caused by urban geometry. •Validation against MODIS, Landsat and in-situ data shows consistent performance. •Excellent performance with physical interpretability and structural consistency. 
 Land surface temperature (LST) retrieved from thermal infrared remote sensing is widely used for urban climate studies. However, varying sensor viewing angles introduce LST biases, complicating spatiotemporal comparisons and climate studies. While geometric models incorporating urban structure have been developed to simulate urban thermal anisotropy (UTA), their applications have primarily focused on theoretical inversion rather than operational angular correction. In this study, we propose an advanced angular correction framework (GUTA-ATCE) for MODIS LST in urban areas that integrates a Time-evolving Geometric UTA (GUTA-T) model with an Enhanced Annual Temperature Cycle (ATCE) model, which dynamically normalizes LST retrievals across different acquisition times using meteorological parameters and vegetation indices. The proposed GUTA-ATCE resolves temporal mismatches in multi-angle observations, and enables correction of view-angle-induced distortions in instantaneous LST retrievals. Quantitative evaluations indicate that GUTA-ATCE–simulated LST agrees closely with MODIS LST observations (R up to 0.98, RMSE ∼2.35 K). Applying GUTA-ATCE reduces the RMSE of MODIS LST against Landsat reference data from 5.09 K (uncorrected) to 4.71 K (corrected). Moreover, GUTA-ATCE's simulated anisotropy patterns align closely with the upscaled results from field measurements (R values of 0.86 and 0.80, RMSE values of 0.96 K and 0.78 K, respectively), confirming its robust capability to capture UTA. Stratified experiments also show that the model accurately captures the spatial heterogeneity of UTA induced by varied building density and height-to-width ratios, achieving RMSE values of 2.32–2.60 K and R values consistently above 0.97. Furthermore, the model robustly simulates moment-specific angular effects under variable meteorological conditions. Compared to the original GUTA-T model, the inclusion of dynamic meteorological parameters in GUTA-ATCE improves agreement with field-based simulations by ΔR = 0.51 (from 0.35 to 0.86) and reduces RMSE by 0.89 K (from 1.85 K to 0.96 K). Our approach provides a scalable and transferable solution for LST angular correction, and advances in utilizing satellite observations for high-resolution urban climate analysis at micro-scales.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 这篇论文主要关注的是利用多源数据融合和循环神经网络来估计烟草产量。它使用了无人机高光谱数据、生物物理参数和生化参数，并结合LSTM和GRU等模型进行预测。虽然涉及遥感数据（无人机高光谱），但其应用领域是农业，而非大气环境监测或大气成分分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。
authors: Mingzheng Zhang;Baoyuan Zhang;Chunjiang Zhao;Liping Chen;Yan Kuai;Cong Wang;Shuwen Jiang;Dong Chen;Qingzhen Zhu;Zhiyong Wang;Xiaohe Gu;Tian’en Chen
title: Tobacco yield estimation via multi-source data fusion and recurrent neural networks
abstract:
•Construct tobacco yield estimation models using multi-source data integration strategy and RNN algorithms. •Design a one-dimensional autoencoder to unify the temporal dimensions of raw data from different years. •The GRU model achieved promising results, with an R2of 0.802 on the training set and 0.705 on the test set 
 In China, tobacco production must strictly follow the yield plan set by the higher authorities. In this context, accurate and stable yield estimation is meaningful for effective production management. In this paper, we adopted a multi-source data fusion strategy to develop the yield estimation models for tobacco. The data used include unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)-borne hyperspectral features (HF), biophysical parameters (BPP) collected in the field, and biochemical parameters (BCP) measured in the laboratory. Since the crop state at different growth stages both affect the final yield, we employed two typical recurrent neural network (RNN) algorithms, long short-term memory (LSTM) and gated recurrent unit (GRU), for modeling. The random forest (RF) algorithm was selected as the baseline scheme. In addition, we designed a one-dimensional convolutional autoencoder (AEC1D) to unify the input dimensions of raw data from different years. It was found that yield estimation performance from multi-source data was more accurate than using any single feature. The GRU model with the HF+BCP+BPP combination achieved the highest estimation accuracy, with an Rv2 of 0.705. The overall performance of LSTM and GRU models was also better than that of RF. We also quantified the contribution of each feature to the model, with HF, BPP, and BCP accounting for approximately 45%, 32%, and 23%, respectively. This study demonstrated the benefits of multi-source data fusion and RNN algorithms in estimating tobacco yields, which can be used to assist in site-specific crop management.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注利用遥感影像和街景图像进行城市功能区变化检测，旨在优化土地利用、改善城市管理和促进可持续发展。论文提出了一种基于深度学习的方法，通过融合遥感和街景数据，并结合时间变化信息，来提高城市功能区变化检测的准确性。实验结果表明，该方法能够有效整合遥感和街景图像，捕捉城市功能区动态变化。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Chenghan Yang;Hong Fang;Shanchuan Guo;Pengfei Tang;Zilong Xia;Xingang Zhang;Peijun Du
title: Detecting urban functional zones changes via multi-source temporal fusion of street view and remote sensing imagery
abstract:
•A Multi-Source Temporal Fusion Model is proposed for UFZs change detection. •A framework that fuses RSI and SVI is introduced for direct urban dynamic monitoring. •Experiments in three cities confirm the model and reveal UFZs transitions since 2014. •Statistical analysis reveals respective strengths of RSI and SVI across scenarios. 
 Monitoring changes in urban functional zones (UFZs) is vital for optimizing land use, improving urban management, and promoting sustainable development, as these changes reflect critical socio-economic dynamics. However, due to the complexity and diversity of UFZs, existing methods face challenges in effectively capturing these changes. Remote sensing (RS) imagery offers top-down views but often misses ground-level details, while street view (SV) imagery provides close-range perspectives. However, effectively integrating SV and RS data for comprehensive UFZs change detection remains a challenge. This paper presents a deep learning-based method that leverages SV and RS data to enhance UFZs change detection. The proposed method employs an attention mechanism to dynamically fuse RS and SV features along with temporal change information. Over 100,000 SV images were classified, and their spatial distribution frequencies were used as features in the Multi-Source Temporal Fusion Model (MSTFM). MSTFM integrates RS and SV data via the Multi-Source Fusion Module (MSFM) and incorporates temporal features through the Multi-Temporal Fusion Module (MTFM), enabling classification and change detection. The method was applied in a large-scale case study across Datong, Chengdu, and Nanjing, achieving 86 % overall accuracy and 82 % Kappa for single-period UFZs classification, and over 93 % accuracy for binary change detection. Experimental results demonstrate the model’s effectiveness in integrating SV and RS imagery and capturing UFZs dynamics, with strong potential for identifying urban renewal and supporting sustainable development.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注利用单景SAR图像进行洪涝灾害范围的精确测绘，特别是在郊区。它提出了一种基于快速傅里叶变换（FFT）的伪影去除方法，以减少SLC图像中的强散射，从而提高洪涝检测的准确性。该方法主要应用于农业用地的洪涝检测，并在没有灾前数据的情况下也能有效工作。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关系。
authors: Ryohei Kametaka;Bruno Adriano;Erick Mas;Shunichi Koshimura
title: Accurate flood extent mapping in suburban areas using a single SAR image: FFT-based artifact removal approach
abstract:
•A single post-disaster SAR image is used for flood mapping. •Strong scattering in SLC is reduced via sub-aperture analysis. •Flood detection improved, with Recall and F1 up∼2.5% in farmland. •Effective without pre-disaster or reference SAR data. 
 Rapid and reliable flood inundation mapping is essential for disaster response. While multi-temporal SAR analysis is widely used, suitable pre-event imagery is often unavailable in real disaster scenarios. This study proposes a method for extracting inundation areas from single SAR data by removing strong scattering components from SLC images using FFT. The method was tested with ALOS-2 PALSAR-2 data from the 2018 Western Japan Heavy Rainfall in Mabi, Kurashiki City. Quantitative evaluation using SSIM confirmed that narrower Hann window sizes enhanced suppression of strong scatterers. Among three histogram-based binarization methods (Mean, Tsai, Otsu), the histogram mean achieved the highest Cohen’s Kappa (0.444). Accuracy assessment demonstrated that the proposed method significantly improved farmland inundation detection compared with conventional binarization, with Recall and F1 scores increasing by approximately 2.5%. In contrast, improvements for flooded buildings were limited due to inherently low baseline accuracy. Overall, the approach enables practical and reliable farmland inundation mapping using single-polarization, single-SAR imagery, even when no pre-event data are available; however, further validation across different conditions and frequency bands is needed.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注城市环境的三维结构表征，提出了一种新的SAR层析成像方法SLIMIC，用于解决传统TomoSAR方法中存在的旁瓣伪影和散射体数量估计不准确的问题。该方法结合了单视迭代MUSIC算法和序贯广义似然比检验，并通过四叉树优化的空间分割来加速参考网络的构建。论文通过使用中国商业卫星Fucheng-1和TerraSAR-X的数据进行验证，展示了该框架在城市三维成像中的有效性。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要侧重于城市建筑物和结构的成像。
authors: Youjun Wang;Zhen Dong;Xiantao Wang;Xing Peng;Shuaiying Zhang;Anxi Yu;Yifei Ji
title: SLIMIC: A novel urban SAR tomography method based on single look iterative MUSIC and sequential GLRT with cancellation
abstract:
•Proposes novel high-resolution, high-precision urban tomography method. •Quadtree-partitioned fast construction of ant colony reference networks. •Chinese commercial satellite Fucheng-1 validated for 3-D urban tomography. 
 Three-dimensional (3-D) structural characterization of urban environments plays a vital role in smart city development, where SAR tomography (TomoSAR) has emerged as a pivotal technique for resolving vertical scatterer distributions. While surpassing persistent scatterer interferometry (PSI) through its unique layover separation capability, conventional TomoSAR implementations remain constrained by two fundamental limitations: persistent side-lobe artifacts and suboptimal scatterer number estimation accuracy. This study presents the SLIMIC framework - a novel single look iterative MUSIC architecture synergistically integrated with sequential generalized likelihood ratio test with cancellation (SGLRTC) - to achieve robust super-resolution imaging while ensuring precise scatterer number determination. Furthermore, we redesign the reference network construction paradigm through quadtree-optimized spatial partitioning, enabling parallel processing that achieves time reduction compared to traditional ant colony search approaches. Extensive validation using Fucheng-1 SAR data (New York, USA) and TerraSAR-X acquisitions (Shenzhen, China) demonstrates the framework’s operational efficacy.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注高光谱图像分类，并提出了一种名为LoLA-SpecViT的新型轻量级光谱视觉Transformer模型。该模型旨在解决高光谱数据维度高、波段间冗余以及标注样本有限等问题。虽然该研究涉及遥感应用，并提到了环境监测，但其重点在于图像处理和分类算法的优化，而非直接针对大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Fadi Abdeladhim Zidi;Djamel Eddine Boukhari;Abdellah Zakaria Sellam;Abdelkrim Ouafi;Cosimo Distante;Salah Eddine Bekhouche;Abdelmalik Taleb-Ahmed
title: LoLA-SpecViT: Local attention SwiGLU vision transformer with LoRA for hyperspectral imaging
abstract:
•LoLA-SpecViT: Multi-Scale Spectral Vision Transformer with local windowed attention. •Enhanced LoRA fine-tuning reduces trainable parameters by over 70% for efficiency. •SwiGLU activations and cyclical LoRA scheduler boost convergence and generalization. •Achieves up to 99.91% overall accuracy on different SOTA datasets. 
 Hyperspectral image classification remains a challenging task due to the high dimensionality of spectral data, significant inter-band redundancy, and the limited availability of annotated samples. While recent transformer-based models have improved the global modeling of spectral–spatial dependencies, their scalability and adaptability under label-scarce conditions remain limited. In this work, we propose LoLA-SpecViT(Low-Rank Adaptation Local Attention Spectral Vision Transformer), a lightweight spectral vision transformer that addresses these limitations through a parameter-efficient architecture tailored to the unique characteristics of hyperspectral imagery. Our model combines a 3D convolutional spectral front-end with local window-based self-attention, enhancing both spectral feature extraction and spatial consistency while reducing computational complexity. To further improve adaptability, we integrate enhanced Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) into attention and projection layers, enabling fine-tuning with over 70% fewer trainable parameters. A novel cyclical learning rate scheduler modulates LoRA adaptation strength during training, improving convergence and generalization. Extensive experiments on four benchmark datasets, WHU-Hi LongKou, WHU-Hi HongHu, Salinas, and QUH-Qingyun, demonstrate that LoLA-SpecViT consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baselines, achieving up to 99.91% accuracy with substantially fewer parameters and enhanced robustness under low-label regimes. The proposed framework provides a scalable and generalizable solution for real-world HSI applications in agriculture, environmental monitoring, and remote sensing analytics. Our code is available in the following GitHub Repository.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要研究利用L波段植被光学深度（L-VOD）预测地表生物量（AGB）的准确性。它评估了不同的预测方法，并指出在稠密雨林中预测的局限性。该研究侧重于生物量估算，而非直接关于大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['L-band Vegetation Optical Depth', 'Aboveground Biomass', 'Remote Sensing', 'SMOS-ICV2', 'Tree Cover']
authors: Yuan Zhang;Philippe Ciais;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Jérôme Chave;Nan Cong;Xiaojun Li;Yan Yang;Sassan Saatchi
title: How accurately does L band vegetation optical depth predict aboveground biomass?
abstract:
•The performances of different methods to predict AGB using L-VOD are investigated. •Adding tree cover remarkably improves L-VOD-based AGB prediction. •All methods fail to capture AGB spatial variation in dense rainforests, where reference data also show large discrepancies. •The temporal relationships between AGB and L-VOD differ from the spatial relationships. 
 L-band Vegetation Optical Depth (L-VOD) has emerged as a critical remote sensing proxy for monitoring global aboveground biomass (AGB) dynamics. Persistent methodological ambiguities, including the absence of standardized protocols for deriving AGB from L-VOD and the use of space-for-time assumption underpinning temporal predictions, pose challenges to the reliability of AGB estimates. In this study, we conducted a comprehensive evaluation on the current methodology using the SMOS-ICV2 L-VOD dataset and five AGB reference datasets. We find that all the existing fitting methods generally capture the AGB spatial variation, achieving 69–77 % variance explanation. Yet integrating tree cover significantly improves the AGB predictions in regions with small and medium L-VOD values. However, all methods fail to capture the spatial variation of AGB references in dense rainforests with L-VOD > 1, where the AGB reference data also show large discrepancies. Testing on space-for-time assumption reveals that spatial AGB sensitivities to L-VOD tend to be larger than temporal sensitivities. We suggest incorporating long-term in situ observations and remotely sensed vegetation structural data to understand the discrepancy between the AGB-L-VOD sensitivities and to improve AGB predictions. By providing a comprehensive evaluation of fitting methods, our results offer a cautionary tale to the use of L-VOD data to infer AGB dynamics and the necessity of developing long-term field-based biomass change datasets for further constraining and evaluating AGB predictions from remote sensing observations.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注汽车内部环境中半挥发性有机化合物（SVOCs）的暴露风险评估，包括对不同人群（如幼儿和职业司机）的暴露剂量估算，以及通过不同途径（如吸入、皮肤接触和灰尘摄入）的暴露情况分析。研究还探讨了汽车环境在个体总暴露量中的贡献。虽然涉及空气中的化学物质，但其重点在于封闭的汽车环境，而非大气环境的遥感监测或成分分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。
authors: Elena Golosovskaia;Maria Bernander;Ian Cotgreave;Patrik L. Andersson
title: Modelling exposure of semi-volatile organic chemicals (SVOCs) in car cabins and assessment of their relative risks
abstract:
•Highest exposure doses in car cabins were estimated for DPHP and TDCIPP. •Toddlers and professional drivers can reach similar exposure doses. •Car cabin exposure dominates the total daily dose of some chemicals. •First-tier risk assessments indicated no health concerns of studied SVOCs. 
 Semi-volatile organic substances (SVOCs) including flame retardants and plasticizers may emit from products during their life cycle and pose health risks, such as endocrine disruption and neurodevelopmental effects. Cars, as enclosed spaces with SVOC-emitting materials, can contribute significantly to human exposure, especially for toddlers and professional drivers who may have higher risk. This study assessed exposure to a selection of SVOCs in car cabins for various scenarios, considering car cabin temperatures (25 °C or 60 °C), user physiology (adult/toddler), and time spent in cars (average user/professional driver). Scenarios included cooling dynamics in warm cars, assuming ventilation reduces cabin temperature from 60 °C to 25 °C within 5 min. The highest total exposure dose was estimated for di-(2-propylheptyl) phthalate (DPHP) and tris(1,3-dichloroisopropyl) phosphate (TDCIPP). Inhalation and air-to-skin contact were the dominant exposure routes for compounds like 2,2′-methylenebis (4-methyl-6-tert-butylphenol) (MBMBP), while ingestion of dust was significant for others like TDCIPP. Data collected from the literature on levels of SVOCs in private houses, offices and childcare facilities facilitated estimation of the contribution of cars to the total dose obtained throughout the day. Although toddlers and professional drivers had similar estimated exposure doses, despite differing times spent in cars, a first-tier risk assessment showed no immediate health concerns, with hazard quotients well below 1. However, refined models and further analysis for sensitive groups remain critical for a deeper analysis of risk.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注热带地区对流的表示，特别是在印度次大陆的季风季节。它使用Gálvez–Davison指数（GDI）来评估对流不稳定性，并将其与常用的稳定性指标进行比较，以确定哪个指标能更准确地捕捉对流的发生。研究强调了GDI在表示深对流方面的优势，并讨论了热力学不稳定性和自由对流层湿度在对流增长中的作用。该研究建议将GDI整合到预测模型中，以提高对流起始的表示和整体预测准确性。总的来说，该研究侧重于天气和气候建模，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Smrutishree Lenka;T.S. Mohan;Saji Mohandas;Ankur Gupta;V.S. Prasad
title: Representation of tropical convection in an advanced process-oriented diagnostic framework
abstract:
•GDI under CQE framework, outperforms common stability indices in capturing moist convection using IMDAA and ERA5 data. •Highlights use of PODs to understand moist convection processes, aiding model development and forecasts. •GDI exhibits smaller spatial biases than forecast rainfall, indicating its reliability for assessing instability-convection coupling. 
 This study explores the applicability of process-oriented diagnostics (POD) for accurately representing convection and understanding of moist processes, which leads to skillful prediction and model development, over tropical regions, focusing on the boreal summer monsoon over the Indian subcontinent. By utilizing the, indigenously developed NCMRWF's high-resolution regional reanalysis, IMDAA and validated using ERA5, the analysis examines large-scale variables such as moisture and temperature, focusing on the warm season (May to October) to understand the instability-convection coupling.The study employs the Gálvez–Davison Index (GDI) as a key tool to address the limitations of existing stability indices (KI, LI, TTI, CAPE, and CINE), which often exhibit discrepancies in accurately capturing the instability-convection coupling. Focusing on convective breeding grounds, such as Central India (CEN) and the Bay of Bengal (BoB), the results reveal that GDI exhibits a stronger and more coherent association with rainfall intensity and variability when compared with other widely accepted stability indices. While CAPE and KI show reasonable agreement with rainfall evolution, GDI proves to be more reliable in representing deep convection over both CEN and BoB. Further, this study highlights the significance of thermodynamic instability and free-tropospheric moisture in convective growth, emphasizing the role of moisture at lower levels and maximum equivalent potential temperature (θe). The study demonstrates that GDI, which is tightly linked to convective-quasi equilibrium (CQE) offers significant improvements in the evolution of convection, and its integration into forecasting models is recommended to enhance the representation of convective initiation and overall forecast accuracy. Furthermore, the study emphasizes the need for high-resolution reanalysis and coupled models for a better understanding of convection.

explanation: 该论文主要研究长江中下游地区早夏季节降水的亚季节预测，利用基于自组织映射（SOM）的循环分类技术，建立环流模式与日降水概率分布之间的非线性关系，并开发统计降尺度模型来提高降水预测的准确性和时间可预测性。虽然涉及大气环流，但与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等没有直接关系，主要关注的是降水预测。
authors: Mei Li;Yunyun Liu;Jinqing Zuo;Yinghan Sang;Jiaxi Yang
title: Subseasonal prediction of early summer precipitation in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River Basin based on circulation classification
abstract:
•A SOM-based downscaling model was developed for improving subseasonal prediction of early summer precipitation in the MLYRB. •The approach significantly enhances spatial accuracy, increasing skills for monthly (pentad) precipitation from 60 % (53 %) to 95 % (92 %). •It extends predictability lead times while still showing limited capability in predicting extreme precipitation events. 
 Employing a Self-Organizing Map (SOM)-based circulation classification technique, this study establishes a nonlinear relationship between circulation patterns and daily precipitation probability distribution during early summer (1961–1990) in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River Basin (MLYRB). Based on this relationship, statistical downscaling models were developed at monthly and pentad scales to capture refined spatial structure of subseasonal precipitation. Following independent tests from 1991 to 2002, the models were driven by daily outputs from the NCEP CFSv2 climate model during 2015–2022 to assess prediction skill. Evaluation results indicate that the proportion of years with statistically significant spatial correlation coefficients between observed and predicted precipitation increased from 60 % (53 %) before downscaling to 95 % (92 %) after downscaling for monthly (pentad) predictions. The multi-year mean pattern correlation coefficients nearly doubled, rising by approximately 0.3 and 0.2 for monthly and pentad scales, respectively. Substantial improvements are also found in the normalized standard deviations and centered root mean square errors, indicating robust long-term predictive performance. Furthermore, the downscaling approach promotes consistency across lead times within two weeks for monthly precipitation predictions (within one month for pentad predictions), demonstrating extended predictable lead times. Overall, the SOM-based statistical downscaling models significantly enhance both the accuracy and temporal predictability of subseasonal precipitation predictions during early summer in MLYRB, showing strong potential for operational regional climate prediction.

explanation: 该研究主要关注南极海冰异常与东亚夏季降水之间的关系，通过观测分析和模型模拟，探讨了南极海冰异常如何影响东亚及邻近海域的夏季降水模式。研究揭示了海冰异常通过影响经向环流、垂直运动和PJ波列，进而改变东亚地区的降水分布。虽然该研究涉及大气环流和气候模式，但其重点并非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Chunyan Xiao;Anmin Duan;Guoxiong Wu;Yuheng Tang;Qilu Wang;Ping Zhang
title: Antarctic sea ice anomaly: Its influence on interannual summer rainfall variability in East Asia and Adjacent Seas
abstract:
•Antarctic sea ice and East Asian summer precipitation show a strong interannual correlation. •Sea ice influences vertical velocity, meridional circulation, and PJ wave trains, impacting summer precipitation. •Model simulations verify the mechanism by which Antarctic sea ice affects East Asian summer precipitation. 
 The objective of this investigation was to uncover the underlying association between the Antarctic sea ice anomaly and the summer rainfall anomaly in East Asia on interannual timescales by employing observational analysis and model simulation methods. During the boreal early summer (from May to July), the leading pattern of sea-ice anomalies primarily shows an abnormal contraction within the Weddell Sea region, while an abnormal expansion occurs within the Amundsen-Bellingshausen Sea and East Antarctica regions. This pattern significantly influences the summer rainfall anomalies in East Asia and its adjacent seas. It results in a dipole-shaped precipitation pattern, with a reduced rainfall anomaly in the tropical western Pacific (TWP) and an increased rainfall anomaly in eastern China (EC). Sea ice anomalies can trigger meridional circulation and vertical motion anomalies via thermal and dynamic effects. These anomalies, at mid-to-high latitudes in the Southern Hemisphere, correspond to the positive phase of the Antarctic Oscillation (AAO) and then propagate from the southern to the northern hemisphere. This process leads to notable downdrafts over the TWP and updrafts over EC. Abnormal downdrafts and divergence suppress convection and precipitation in the TWP, whereas updrafts and convergence facilitate them in EC. Furthermore, the distinctive maritime continent conditions over the TWP, which are coupled with the suppression of convection, act to foster a teleconnection mode that closely resembles the reverse Pacific-Japan (PJ) mode. The reversed PJ-like mode further intensifies the strong dipole-like precipitation anomalies between the TWP and EC. Finally, numerical experiments verified the physical mechanism by which the Antarctic sea-ice anomaly affects the summer precipitation anomalies in East Asia and its adjacent seas.

explanation:
该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是脑科学领域，特别是人类胎儿大脑的单细胞多分辨率图谱构建以及人类中脑培养的转录组保真度研究。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接或明显的关联。

具体来说，该研究似乎旨在创建一个详细的胎儿大脑细胞图谱，并评估体外培养的中脑细胞在基因表达上是否能忠实地反映体内情况。 这项工作属于发育生物学、神经科学和基因组学的范畴，而不是大气科学或环境科学。
authors: Hilary S. Y. Toh;Lisheng Xu;Carissa Chen;Pengyi Yang;Alfred X. Sun;John F. Ouyang
title: BrainSTEM: A single-cell multiresolution fetal brain atlas reveals transcriptomic fidelity of human midbrain cultures

title: The two-component nuclease-active KELShedu system confers broad antiphage activity via abortive infection

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是 Paramecium（草履虫）和 Chlorella（小球藻）之间的光合共生关系，以及这种共生关系如何帮助它们在贫营养条件下生存。研究的核心是生物学和生态学，特别是关于营养循环和生物互利共生机制。与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注免疫学领域，特别是 TH1 效应 CD4 T 细胞在诱导斑秃（Alopecia Areata）中的作用，以及 IFN-γ 产生的重要性。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究旨在理解斑秃这种自身免疫性疾病的免疫机制，而不是大气环境科学。
authors: Samuel J. Connell;Sydney Crotts;Ryan Reis;Maddison M. Lensing;Payton Kahl;Nicholas Henderson;Otgonzaya Ayush;Zhaowen Zhu;Luana S. Ortolan;Audrey C. Ko;Erin M. Shriver;Keith D. Carter;John T. Harty;Joan M. Goverman;Ali Jabbari

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是仿生协同纹理和颜色调制，通过胆甾型液晶弹性体双层膜的表面不稳定性实现。这属于材料科学和光学工程领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。论文研究的是材料表面的纹理和颜色控制，而不是大气环境的探测和分析。
authors: Xiao Yang;Jay Sim;Wenbin Huang;Ruike Renee Zhao
title: Bioinspired synergistic texture and color modulation enabled by surface instability of cholesteric liquid crystal elastomer bilayers

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注的是材料科学领域，特别是五角星形孪晶纳米结构中平衡位错应变的精确映射。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究似乎专注于纳米材料的结构和力学性能，而不是大气环境的测量或分析。
authors: Zhihua Cheng;Chuqiao Shi;Kaijie Zhao;Michael Engel;Matthew R. Jones;Yimo Han
title: Precision mapping of equilibrium disclination strain in pentagonally twinned nanostructures

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注CRISPR激活筛选揭示的纤毛解体通路，以及该通路在局灶性皮质发育不良中的突变。这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于生物医学领域，特别是基因编辑和神经发育障碍。
authors: Shane D. Elliott;Paul J. Ready;Caitlin M. Wrinn;Qianqian Ma;Marina Edward;Robert F. Niescier;Iris Escobar;Jingbo Sun;Anil Kumar Ganga;Ceara K. McAtee;İrem Sude Atiş;Anthony J. Koleske;Angélique Bordey;David K. Breslow
title: A CRISPR activation screen reveals a cilia disassembly pathway mutated in focal cortical dysplasia

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注北半球积雪范围的变化趋势，特别是季节性开始时间的不一致性。虽然积雪覆盖与气候变化和地球表面反照率有关，间接影响大气能量平衡，但它本身并不直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。 因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Aleksandra Elias Chereque;Paul J. Kushner;Lawrence Mudryk;Chris Derksen
title: Determining the cause of inconsistent onset-season trends in the Northern Hemisphere snow cover extent record

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注水杨酸和活性氧信号如何通过 NPR1 和 EX1 调节黑暗中下胚轴的伸长。这篇论文是植物生理学和分子生物学领域的研究，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究主要关注植物内部的生物化学过程，而不是大气环境的外部监测。
authors: Mengshuang Li;Mengping Li;Shan Qi;Liangsheng Wang;Chanhong Kim
title: Salicylic acid and ROS signaling modulate hypocotyl elongation in darkness via NPR1 and EX1

authors: Myriam Richaud;Rohit Shrivastava;Dimitris Xirodimas;Simon Galas;Aymeric Bailly
title: Tardigrade Dsup extends C. elegans life span by impeding mitochondrial respiration and promoting oxidative stress resistance

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要主要关注尿液中的有机磷酸酯与健康老年人氧化应激之间的关系。虽然有机磷酸酯可能最终进入环境，包括大气，但这项研究的重点是生物暴露和健康影响，而不是大气环境遥感技术。因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术没有直接关系。研究重点在于生物标志物和人体健康，而非大气环境科学。

authors: Haipeng Huang;Jiaqi Hou;Beidou Xi
title: The Need to Implement Innovative Technologies to Advance Research on the Biotoxicity of Micro- and Nanoplastics

title: Malignant Transformation of Human Uroepithelial Cells Induced by Long-Term Exposure to a Disinfection Byproduct─2,6-Dichlorobenzoquinone

explanation: 该研究标题和摘要主要关注的是中国的出生队列研究，探讨环境和遗传因素对健康的影响。它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关系。研究重点在于识别影响中国人群健康的遗传和环境因素，而不是利用遥感技术进行大气研究。
authors: Jiaqi Zhu;Juan Chen;Kai Zhao;Qi Wang;Lei Jin;Lijun Pei;Furong Deng;Liyun Wang;Huimeng Liu;Yu You;Yaxin Wang;Rongrong Li;Linlin Cui;Shigang Zhao;Hongsong Yu;Xiao-Wen Zeng;Yonghong Tian;Guang-Hui Dong;Hui-Ping Zhang;Shaowei Wu;Xuejun Shang

authors: Xiaoqing Wang;Yang Huang;Fei Li;Jin Wang;Chenglong Ji;Huifeng Wu;Yitao Pan;Jiayin Dai
title: Machine Learning Models for High-Throughput Screening of Obesogens Based on Pathway Network

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注人体血液、皮下脂肪和内脏脂肪中双酚类似物的出现模式。 这项研究的重点是生物样本中特定化学物质的存在和分布，而不是大气环境遥感技术。 因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等领域无关。 这项研究更偏向于环境健康和毒理学领域。
authors: Peng Jiao;Yue Gao;Aijing Li;Zhenhua Lu;Mei Du;Jinghai Song;Maoyong Song

authors: Changjie Li;Shanshan Wang;Xiangrong Chen;Chenxin Dongye;Yanfang Zhao;T.-W. Dominic Chan;Xiangfeng Chen

explanation: 该研究标题和摘要主要关注环境中的超细颗粒物空气污染与心血管疾病发病率之间的关系。虽然涉及空气污染，但重点是其对健康的影响，而不是使用遥感技术进行大气环境监测或分析大气成分。因此，与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱，更偏向于环境健康领域。

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注邻苯二甲酸酯暴露对后代神经行为的影响，以及CYP450转录通路的抑制。它与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该研究属于毒理学和神经发育生物学的范畴，而非大气科学。
authors: Jingcun Dong;Jia Yin;Shuang Liu;Qingqing Zhu;Jiaying Liu;Jinfeng Peng;Chunyang Liao;Guibin Jiang
title: Developmental Mono(2-ethylhexyl) Phthalate Exposure Impairs Offspring Neurobehavior through Suppression of CYP450 Transcriptional Pathways

explanation: 该研究主要关注金属纳米材料的硫化作用如何影响巨噬细胞的摄取，以及蛋白质冠的组成和聚集状态在其中的作用。 这项研究属于纳米材料毒理学和生物医学领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 该研究没有提及大气成分、污染物或遥感技术。
authors: Tingting Du;Ziyan Wang;Jiao Chen;Guangbo Qu;Tong Zhang;Wei Chen
title: Sulfidation Affects Macrophage Uptake of Metal-Based Nanomaterials by Dictating Protein Corona Compositions and Aggregation States Collectively

explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明，它主要关注MeP（一种化学物质）在人体相关暴露水平下诱导的代谢紊乱和肝损伤，以及肠道微生物群在其中的作用。 这项研究似乎与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。 它更侧重于毒理学、代谢组学和微生物组研究。
authors: Henglin Zhang;Yanan Zhao;Haitao Tu;Yuxian Liu;Yiling Lin;Yanpeng Cai;Liang Chi;Tao Zhang;Bingling Dai;Jingchuan Xue

explanation: 该论文的标题表明其主要关注机器学习在环境非目标识别中的应用进展。虽然环境领域广泛，可能包括大气环境，但从标题来看，重点在于使用机器学习来识别环境中的未知污染物或物质，而不是特定的遥感技术或大气成分分析。因此，该论文可能涉及大气环境，但并非直接或主要关注大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Qinyu Bao;Nanyang Yu;Qinting Jiang;Xuebing Wang;Zhaoyu Jiao;Si Wei
title: Recent Advances in Implementation of Machine Learning for Environmental Nontarget Identification

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是利用干涉合成孔径雷达（InSAR）技术监测和分析缓慢移动的滑坡。论文探讨了如何使用变化点检测（CPD）技术来识别滑坡变形过程中的细微变化，例如加速、失稳或停滞。研究通过结合InSAR数据和CPD算法，对金沙江流域的三个滑坡进行了分析，并建立了一个专家注释的InSAR滑坡变化点数据集。研究结果表明，不同的CPD算法在不同的环境条件下表现出不同的性能，并成功识别了地震群和自然溃坝事件引起的滑坡变形。总的来说，该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，主要集中在地质灾害监测和InSAR技术应用方面。
authors: Zongzheng Li;Jianping Chen;Chen Cao;Wen Zhang;Yuchao Li;Jiayi Hu;Zheng Li
title: Detecting subtle nonlinear changes in slow-moving landslides with a hybrid InSAR change point detection framework: Methodological assessment and validation
abstract:
•Closed-loop InSAR-CPD Optimized workflow bridging geological background and algorithmic adaptation. •CPD-detected landslide responses to overlooked Mw 4.6–5.3 earthquakes are validated. •An expert-annotated InSAR landslide change-point dataset is constructed. 
 Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) technology provides high-resolution time-series observation capabilities for monitoring surface slow-moving landslide deformation. Accurately identifying subtle yet critical change points (CPs)—acceleration, destabilization, or stagnation—remains a key challenge in improving the timeliness and reliability of geological hazard early warning systems. To validate the performance limits of CP detection methods under complex environmental conditions, this study integrates InSAR data with advanced Change Point Detection (CPD) techniques. Three slow-moving landslides (Xiongba, Sela, and Gongba) along the Jinsha River Basin were selected, with their subtle surface deformation histories from 2014 to 2022 reconstructed using SBAS-InSAR analysis. The first InSAR-based landslide critical point validation set was established, comprising 752 independently annotated deformation datasets from four geologists. Bayesian optimization was employed to quantitatively delineate the applicability boundaries of the three algorithms—Breaks For Additive Season and Trend (BFAST), Bayesian Estimator of Abrupt change, Seasonal and Trend change (BEAST) and Parallel Autoencoder (PAE). The results reveal that BEAST achieves superior precision (0.93) in noise-free, seasonally dominated environments, whereas PAE demonstrates robust recall (0.62) under real-world. BFAST prioritizes sensitivity to trend breaks but exhibits higher false positive rates. By employing a multi-model consensus approach, we precisely identified deformation processes associated with seismic swarms and natural dam-break events, and confirmed that the dam-break-induced displacement threshold closely aligns with previous findings. Notably, this study provides the first evidence that local earthquake swarms (Mw 4.6–5.3) can trigger abrupt landslide displacement. Overall, integrating CPD with InSAR time-series effectively detects subtle nonlinear changes missed by threshold methods. Our hybrid validation (simulated data, expert annotations, geological records) shows method effectiveness depends on geodynamic context, requiring scenario-specific selection. Future integration of CPD with high-precision, real-time InSAR will greatly enhance landslide early warning.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注干旱地区棉田土壤盐渍化的动态监测，利用无人机和卫星遥感数据，通过时空融合算法生成高分辨率的每日盐度图，以支持精准灌溉管理。研究重点在于土壤盐分监测和农业应用，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Jiangtao Li;Jianli Ding;Jinjie Wang;Jiao Tan;Xiangyu Ge;Kuangda Cui;Yue Liu
title: Daily-scale dynamic monitoring of soil salinization in arid cotton fields based on multi-source remote sensing spatiotemporal fusion
abstract:
•Evaluated four spatiotemporal fusion algorithms integrating 5-cm UAV and daily satellite imagery for soil salinity monitoring. •RERC achieved superior fusion accuracy (RMSE = 0.024–0.055; SSIM = 0.821–0.925) preserving salinity–spectral consistency. •RF-RERC framework reached R² = 0.94, approaching UAV accuracy with optimal temporal stability. •Produced daily salinity maps enabling precision irrigation management in arid agricultural systems. 
 Soil salinization poses critical threats to agricultural sustainability in arid regions, while traditional monitoring approaches lack efficiency and single remote sensing platforms encounter inherent spatiotemporal resolution trade-offs. This study developed a comprehensive daily-scale soil salinity monitoring framework by systematically evaluating four spatiotemporal fusion algorithms: Spatial and Temporal Adaptive Reflectance Fusion Model (STARFM), Unmixing-Based Data Fusion (UBDF), Fit-FC, and Unmixing-Based Spatiotemporal Image Fusion Based on the Self-Trained Random Forest Regression and Residual Compensation (RERC), integrating 5-cm resolution Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) multispectral imagery with daily Plantscope satellite data across high-standard farmland and saline-alkaline farmland throughout cotton phenological stages. Four machine learning algorithms (Random Forest, eXtreme Gradient Boosting, Support Vector Regression, Artificial Neural Network) were comparatively assessed for salinity inversion. RERC demonstrated superior fusion performance with Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) of 0.055 (high-standard farmland) and 0.024 (saline-alkaline farmland), Structural Similarity Index (SSIM) reaching 0.821 and 0.925, respectively. The optimal Random Forest-RERC framework achieved coefficient of determination (R2) = 0.94 during boll-opening stage, approaching actual UAV accuracy (R2 = 0.95). Generated daily salinity maps successfully captured fine-scale spatiotemporal dynamics, providing operational solutions for precision salinity management in arid agricultural systems.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注的是利用深度信息辅助变化检测，着重于遥感图像处理和计算机视觉技术。它提出了一种新的框架，通过从单目2D图像中提取相对深度线索来检测变化，并利用深度估计模型生成的伪标签进行训练。该方法在二元变化检测和语义变化检测数据集上进行了评估，并取得了良好的效果。虽然该论文使用了遥感图像，但其核心在于图像处理和变化检测算法，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Yujun Quan;Anzhu Yu;Xuanbei Lu;Xuefeng Cao;Linyang Li;Xiong You
title: A change detection framework with relative depth information assistance
abstract:
•A multi-task framework of change detection and depth estimation is proposed. •Relative depth maps generated by the foundation model are used as pseudo-labels. •Dual-phase fusion and multi-scale fusion strategies are proposed. 
 A single 2D image could encompass an endless number of 3D entities, making it difficult to detect changes automatically via visual interpretation, particularly in the context of remote sensing images that span vast regions of the earth under diverse imaging conditions. While elevation data can mitigate spurious changes induced by varying illumination, seasonal variations, and sensor viewing geometries, prevailing approaches rely heavily on high-quality 3D data, creating dependencies that limit their applicability in regions with limited access to such data. To circumvent this limitation, we propose a novel Depth-assisted Change Detection Framework (DaCDF) that extracts relative depth cues directly from monocular 2D images. By enforcing cross-temporal consistency on photometric features, our method learns an invariant representation without requiring absolute 3D ground truth. Specifically, we designed a multi-task network to jointly accomplish change detection (CD) and monocular depth estimation (MDE), where depth maps generated by foundation models (e.g., the Depth Anything Model) are employed as pseudo-labels for the MDE branch. An intra-task Progressive Multi-scale Fusion (PMF) strategy is incorporated to effectively integrate local details and global contextual information for the depth estimation task. Furthermore, a cross-task dual-phase fusion scheme is implemented to strengthen feature representations by leveraging complementary cues from the counterpart task, thereby enabling mutually reinforced co-adaptation of the two objectives. The proposed DaCDF demonstrates seamless compatibility with mainstream encoder–decoder architectures, including both CNN-based (e.g., FarSeg) and Transformer-based (e.g., Swin Transformer UPerNet) architectures for CD. Extensive evaluations were conducted on the binary change detection (BCD) datasets WHU-CD and LEVIR-CD, and the semantic change detection (SCD) SECOND dataset, revealing consistent performance gains. Specifically, DaCDF achieves 4–6% IoU gains over baselines on WHU-CD and 1–7% on LEVIR-CD. For SECOND, it obtains 1–3% mIoU improvement compared to baseline models. The method outperforms current SOTA methods in CD metrics.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注巴西城市地区车辆排放标准对空气质量的影响。虽然涉及空气污染和空气质量，但重点在于评估政策效果和提出改进建议，而非直接利用大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析）。论文分析了车辆排放标准对减少空气污染的贡献，并强调需要结合城市规划和交通管理等综合措施来改善空气质量。
topic_words: ['Air pollution', 'Emission standards', 'Air quality', 'Urban air quality', 'Fuel consumption', 'Vehicle fleet']
authors: Amanda Karine Chaves Ribeiro;Anderson Paulo Rudke;Elson Silva Galvão;Rizzieri Pedruzzi;Prashant Kumar;Maria de Fatima Andrade;Taciana Toledo de Almeida Albuquerque
title: Can vehicle emission standards alone ensure clean air in urban centers? Lessons from a South American metropolitan area
abstract:
•Air pollutant levels remain high, posing persistent public health risks. •National programs led to partial mitigation via emission standards. •Emission standards alone are insufficient to ensure clean urban air. •Integrated policies needed: fleet renewal, mobility, and urban planning. •Highlights air quality–climate co-benefits for cities in the Global South. 
 The transport sector is one of the main contributors to air pollution in Brazilian urban centers. To address this, the Brazilian government implemented the Air Pollution Control Program for Motor Vehicles (PROCONVE) and the Air Pollution Control Program for Motorcycles and Similar Vehicles (PROMOT), aiming to regulate emissions from light-duty vehicles (LDVs), heavy-duty vehicles (HDVs), and motorcycles. This study evaluates the long-term effectiveness of these programs in the Metropolitan Region of Belo Horizonte (MRBH), a highly urbanized and industrialized area in southeastern Brazil. Results show that, between 1999 and 2020, while total fuel consumption and the vehicle fleet expanded by approximately 52 % and 131 %, respectively, average pollution levels declined by 46 % over the same period. However, pollutant concentrations in the MRBH often exceed the World Health Organization (WHO) Air Quality Guidelines for long-term exposure, indicating ongoing public health risks. While the national programs have contributed to emission reductions through technological advances in vehicles and fuels, they have not been sufficient to ensure air quality levels that effectively protect public health. This study highlights the need for complementary measures focused on urban planning and transport management to reduce traffic volume and improve local air quality. Vehicle emission standards alone are insufficient to guarantee clean air in Brazilian urban centers. Broader progress requires integrated strategies combining cleaner technologies, fleet renewal, sustainable mobility policies, and climate-resilient transport systems.

explanation: 该研究主要关注东亚地区大气河流的时空演变特征，提出了一种新的大气河流识别算法（MAI），并分析了大气河流的季节性变化、降水贡献以及与热带气旋的相互作用。此外，研究还探讨了ENSO和QBO对西北太平洋30°N附近大气河流活动的影响。虽然该研究涉及大气现象，但其重点在于气候变化和水循环，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Tingting Zhu;Wenchao Liu;Wenhao Li;C.K. Shum;Shengkai Zhang;Yu Zhang
title: Exploration of the spatiotemporal evolution characteristics of atmospheric rivers in East Asia in the past decade based on a multidimensional adaptive atmospheric river identification algorithm
abstract:
•MAI takes a new TC-like feature exclusion approach. •Seasonal variations of AR frequency and precipitation in East Asia. •Analyzed features of ARs in isolation and during their interaction with TCs. •AR activity along 30°N is significantly modulated by ENSO and QBO. 
 Atmospheric Rivers (ARs) represent a critical driver of global water cycling and extreme weather phenomena, playing a pivotal role in precipitation distribution and extreme event occurrence across mid-to-high latitude regions. Given the high-frequency presence of tropical cyclones within the East Asian research domain, this study proposes a novel Multidimensional Adaptive Atmospheric River Identification System (MAI) to facilitate a more focused analysis of AR filamentary structures and their associated atmospheric circulation systems. MAI integrates Breadth-First Search and Neighborhood Search methodologies to construct a Tri-directional Axis Search method, aimed at optimizing AR axis smoothness and enhancing the computational precision of AR length determinations. Simultaneously, a multi-parameter discrimination model is employed to distinguish TCs embedded within ARs. Climatological analyses of ARs within the study region reveal their most pronounced seasonal variability along a trajectory extending from southwestern low latitudes to northeastern mid-latitudes, with variations exceeding 75 % of the annual mean. Summer exhibits the highest AR frequency, with peak occurrences reaching 32 %. Moreover, ARs contribute approximately 20.06 % of the total regional precipitation annually. Further investigation into the influences of El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO) and Quasi-Biennial Oscillation (QBO) demonstrates their significant modulation of AR activities along the 30°N latitude in the Northwest Pacific. During El Niño and easterly QBO (EQBO) phases, AR frequencies increase, facilitated by enhanced 850 hPa southwesterly winds and elevated 500 hPa geopotential heights that promote moisture transportation. Conversely, La Niña and westerly QBO (WQBO) phases suppress AR activities, particularly evident in wind field reductions over Southeast China and Southern Japan.

explanation: 根据提供的标题“用于实时自主自由曲面超表面设计的多代理框架”和摘要，该研究似乎集中于超材料的设计和优化，特别强调实时性和自主性。它涉及多代理系统，这表明该方法使用多个智能体协同工作来解决设计问题。自由曲面超表面指的是具有复杂表面结构的超材料。因此，这项研究主要属于材料科学、光学工程和人工智能领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该论文探讨的是一种新的超材料设计方法，利用多智能体框架实现实时自主设计。
authors: Robert Lupoiu;Yixuan Shao;Tianxiang Dai;Chenkai Mao;Kofi Edée;Jonathan A. Fan
title: A multi-agentic framework for real-time, autonomous freeform metasurface design

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要描述了一种用于自由行为小鼠的微型化微型相机阵列显微镜（mini-MCAM），用于进行全皮层细胞成像。 这项研究主要关注神经科学和生物医学工程领域，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。该论文主要描述了一种新型显微镜技术及其在生物研究中的应用。

title: Pan-cortical cellular imaging in freely behaving mice using a miniaturized micro-camera array microscope (mini-MCAM)

explanation: 该论文主要研究的是感觉运动适应过程中的上下文效应，并提出了一个受小脑启发的模型来解释这种现象。它关注的是神经科学和计算建模，与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关系。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术领域不相关。

authors: Jakub Krčma;Ondřej Wojewoda;Martin Hrtoň;Jakub Holobrádek;Jon Ander Arregi;Jaganandha Panda;Ekaterina Pribytova;Michal Urbánek

authors: Yohalie Kalukula;Giuseppe Ciccone;Danahe Mohammed;Anthony Procès;Marie Versaevel;Amandine Deridoux;Lucie Ergot;Zoé Barbier;Maxime Mansy;Roxane Aucouturier;Rémi Tranzer;Mathieu Surin;Sylvain Gabriele;Marine Luciano
