explanation: 该论文主要讨论欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）成立50周年，并采访了中心主任Florence Rabier博士，内容涉及过去五十年在天气预报领域取得的成就，以及未来天气预报领域面临的机遇和挑战。该论文主要关注天气预报，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['weather forecasting', 'medium-range weather prediction', 'ECMWF', 'challenges in weather prediction', 'opportunities in weather prediction']
title: 50 years of weather forecasting at the ECMWF
abstract:
The European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) is celebrating its 50th anniversary this year. In celebration of this occasion, we are talking with Dr. Florence Rabier, Director-General of the ECMWF, about what has been achieved over the last five decades and what opportunities and challenges lie ahead in the field of weather prediction. 
 The European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) is celebrating its 50th anniversary this year. In celebration of this occasion, we are talking with Dr. Florence Rabier, Director-General of the ECMWF, about what has been achieved over the last five decades and what opportunities and challenges lie ahead in the field of weather prediction.

explanation: 该论文主要研究的是利用双极电化学原理，通过原始碳纤维的不对称特性，实现微型镊子的功能。这种技术主要应用于软体机器人和微机械领域，与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的相关性较低。
authors: Bhavana Gupta;Vishal Shrivastav;Shashank Sundriyal;Ambrose Ashwin Melvin;Marcin Holdynski;Alexander Kuhn;Wojciech Nogala
title: Bipolar electrochemical tweezers using pristine carbon fibers with intrinsically asymmetric features
abstract:
The article demonstrates that pristine carbon fibers can bend and act like micro-tweezers when stimulated wirelessly by bipolar electrochemistry, offering a simple approach to creating actuators for soft robotics and micromechanics. 
 Structures that can be stimulated to change shape may be utilized for a variety of applications, but they frequently need to be processed and modified. We propose here a simple, straightforward strategy of actuation based on bipolar electrochemistry driving asymmetric reactions at the surface grooves of pristine carbon fibers. In the first set of proof-of-principle experiments, a free-standing carbon fiber is polarized in a closed bipolar cell to trigger asymmetric benzoquinone/hydroquinone redox reactions in the two distinct compartments. Beyond a particular threshold potential, ion transfer occurs, and the part of the fiber involved in the anodic reaction exhibits reversible directional motion. Elemental surface characterization of the polarized carbon fiber indicates that the deflection is due to the intercalation/deintercalation of ions accompanying the oxidation/reduction of the fiber. The simultaneous local surface ionic adsorption/desorption is responsible for the fiber deflection. The length of the fiber part exposed to the electrochemical reduction reaction in the opposite compartment of the closed bipolar cell, as well as the groove orientation, determines the motion’s intensity and direction, respectively. Effective bending is achieved by optimization of fiber alignment and stimuli parameters. Actuation of two parallel fibers, oriented in opposite directions, leads to microtweezer-type behavior. We anticipate that these results will enrich the tool case for research in the field of soft robotics and micromechanics. The article demonstrates that pristine carbon fibers can bend and act like micro-tweezers when stimulated wirelessly by bipolar electrochemistry, offering a simple approach to creating actuators for soft robotics and micromechanics.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是胰岛素抵抗的遗传基础及其与心血管代谢疾病的关系。论文通过多变量全基因组关联研究，识别出与胰岛素抵抗相关的基因位点，并探讨潜在的治疗靶点。虽然该研究对人类健康有重要意义，但它与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Chaojie Ye;Chun Dou;Dong Liu;Lijie Kong;Mingling Chen;Min Xu;Yu Xu;Mian Li;Zhiyun Zhao;Jie Zheng;Jieli Lu;Yuhong Chen;Guang Ning;Weiqing Wang;Yufang Bi;Tiange Wang
title: Multivariate genome-wide analyses of insulin resistance unravel novel loci and therapeutic targets for cardiometabolic health
abstract:
Insulin resistance contributes to cardiometabolic disease, but its genetic basis remains incompletely defined. Here, the authors identify 217 associated loci and highlight potential therapeutic targets, linking insulin resistance to multiple diseases and aging traits. 
 Limited identification of insulin resistance-associated loci hinders understanding of its role in cardiometabolic health, impeding therapeutic strategies. We apply three multivariate genome-wide association study approaches on homeostatic model assessment for insulin resistance, insulin resistance index, fasting insulin, and ratio of triglycerides to high-density lipoprotein cholesterol from MAGIC and UK Biobank to develop a comprehensive phenotype (‘mvIR’), and identify 217 independent loci, including 24 novel loci. The mvIR is causally associated with higher risks of 17 cardiometabolic diseases and five aging phenotypes, independent of adiposity and sarcopenia. We outline 21 of 2644 druggable genes for insulin resistance by Mendelian randomization and colocalization, where six genes (AKT1, ERBB3, FCGR1A, FGFR1, LPL, NR1H3) encode targets for approved drugs with consistent directions in alleviating insulin resistance, with no significant side effects revealed by phenome-wide association study. This study uncovers novel loci and therapeutic targets to inform strategies promoting insulin resistance-centered cardiometabolic health and longevity. Insulin resistance contributes to cardiometabolic disease, but its genetic basis remains incompletely defined. Here, the authors identify 217 associated loci and highlight potential therapeutic targets, linking insulin resistance to multiple diseases and aging traits.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注细胞器内SPFH蛋白复合物的结构，特别是内质网驻留的Erlin复合物和线粒体prohibitin复合物。论文通过冷冻电镜技术揭示了这些复合物的组成和结构，并探讨了它们在细胞器蛋白质量控制中的作用。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Jingjing Gao;Dawafuti Sherpa;Nikita Kupko;Haruka Chino;Jianwei Zeng;Sichen Shao
title: Structures of human organellar SPFH protein complexes
abstract:
SPFH proteins oligomerize with distinct stoichiometries in all kingdoms of life. Here, Gao et al. determine cryo-EM structures to elucidate the compositions of the ER-resident Erlin and the mitochondrial prohibitin SPFH complexes implicated in organellar protein quality control. 
 Stomatin, Prohibitin, Flotillin, and HflK/C (SPFH) family proteins are found in all kingdoms of life and in multiple eukaryotic organelles. SPFH proteins assemble into homo- or hetero-oligomeric rings that form domed structures. Most SPFH assemblies also abut a cellular membrane, where they are implicated in diverse functions ranging from membrane organization to protein quality control. However, the precise architectures of different SPFH complexes remain unclear. Here, we report single-particle cryo-EM structures of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER)-resident Erlin1/2 complex and the mitochondrial prohibitin (PHB1/2) complex, revealing assemblies of 13 heterodimers of Erlin1 and Erlin2 and 11 heterodimers of PHB1 and PHB2, respectively. We also describe key interactions underlying the architecture of each complex and conformational heterogeneity of the PHB1/2 complex. Our findings elucidate the distinct stoichiometries and properties of human organellar SPFH complexes and highlight common principles of SPFH complex organization. SPFH proteins oligomerize with distinct stoichiometries in all kingdoms of life. Here, Gao et al. determine cryo-EM structures to elucidate the compositions of the ER-resident Erlin and the mitochondrial prohibitin SPFH complexes implicated in organellar protein quality control.

explanation: 该研究主要关注的是一种新型催化剂（Ni掺杂的W18O49纳米线），用于在太阳光驱动下将甲醇脱水转化为二甲醚（DME）。虽然DME可能作为一种清洁燃料对空气质量有间接影响，但该研究本身并不直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。研究重点在于材料科学、催化反应和化学合成，而非大气环境科学。
authors: Dehua Tian;Yinlan Liang;Zhaoke Zheng;Liang Mao;Xiaoyan Cai;Yizhen Chen;Xiangxian Wang;Xiaolei Liu;Juan Li;Zeyan Wang;Can Xue;Baojun Li;Zaizhu Lou
title: Plasmonic Ni-doped W<sub>18</sub>O<sub>49</sub> with dual active sites drives efficient methanol dehydration to dimethyl ether
abstract:
This study introduces Ni-doped W18O49 nanowires that integrate low-coordinated W and Ni dual active sites with surface plasmon resonance, facilitating solar-driven methanol dehydration for efficient dimethyl ether generation. 
 Photocatalytic methanol dehydration to dimethyl ether (DME) offers a sustainable alternative to energy-intensive thermocatalysis, yet its practical application remains constrained by low efficiency. Herein, we designed Ni-doped plasmonic W18O49 nanowires that synergistically integrates low-coordinated W and Ni dual active sites with surface plasmon resonance for enhanced photocatalytic performance. The synergistic effect of W and Ni dual sites is amplified by plasmonic electron oscillations to facilitate the C-O bond cleavage and C-O-C coupling, driving efficient methanol-to-DME conversion. The optimized Ni0.66-W18O49 achieves a DME yield of 133.7 ± 3.3 mmol g-1 h-1 with 98.7% selectivity under 400 mW cm-2 illumination. The versatility of the catalyst is demonstrated through C2+ alcohol dehydration, achieving 40-80% rate enhancements and a recorded isobutylene yield of 3.7 mol g-1 h-1. This study highlights the huge potential of rationally engineered plasmonic semiconductors in solar-driven chemical synthesis, particularly for C-O bond activation and coupling reactions. This study introduces Ni-doped W18O49 nanowires that integrate low-coordinated W and Ni dual active sites with surface plasmon resonance, facilitating solar-driven methanol dehydration for efficient dimethyl ether generation.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注肿瘤免疫治疗的耐药性机制，特别是 BCL9 在肝细胞癌（HCC）免疫治疗中的作用。研究发现 BCL9 与免疫检查点抑制剂（ICI）的耐药性相关，并通过靶向 BCL9 的肽 hsBCL9Z96 在小鼠模型中促进抗肿瘤免疫反应。该研究侧重于肿瘤微环境中的 Wnt/β-catenin 信号通路如何影响先天性和适应性免疫反应，以及靶向 BCL9 如何逆转 ICI 耐药性。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Sui-Yi Wu;Yuan-Yuan Zhu;Jia-Lei Sun;Chun-Yan Wang;Yu-Lei Wang;Yan-Yan Nie;Fei Song;Xun Huang;Zhong Chen;Tian He;Li-An Shen;Yang Xu;Cheng Huang;Shuang-Jian Qiu;Jian Zhou;Andrew X. Zhu;Jia Fan;Di Zhu;Bo Hu;Xin-Rong Yang
title: Targeting tumor-intrinsic BCL9 reverses immunotherapy resistance by eliciting macrophage-mediated phagocytosis and antigen presentation
abstract:
Immune checkpoint inhibitors have shown promise in tumour immunotherapy but resistance has been seen. Here using pre-treatment hepatocellular carcinoma patient biopsies from patients scheduled for immunotherapy, the authors implicate BCL9 and show that a BCL9-targeting peptide promotes anti-tumour immunity in mouse models through targeting macrophages and promoting anti-tumour T cell responses. 
 Immune checkpoint inhibitors (ICI) benefit some cancer patients but de novo resistance remains poorly understood. Analyzing transcriptional data from two clinical trial cohorts, GO30140 and IMbrave150, we find B cell lymphoma 9 (BCL9), a Wnt/β-catenin co-factor, associated with resistance. We develop a BCL9-targeting peptide, hsBCL9Z96, which suppresses tumor growth in combination with anti-PD-L1 ab in preclinical hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) mouse models. Multi-omics analyses implicate targeting BCL9 inhibits BMP4 secretion and downregulates CD24 on tumor cells, reprogramming macrophages toward a tumor-suppressive phenotype and promoting macrophage phagocytosis. This in turn rejuvenates T cell immunity via enhanced macrophage-mediated antigen presentation. Our data extend our understanding of how tumor-derived Wnt/β-catenin signaling impedes the innate and adaptive immune responses in the tumor microenvironment and provide preliminary evidence that targeting BCL9 is a promising preclinical strategy to mitigate ICI resistance in HCC. Immune checkpoint inhibitors have shown promise in tumour immunotherapy but resistance has been seen. Here using pre-treatment hepatocellular carcinoma patient biopsies from patients scheduled for immunotherapy, the authors implicate BCL9 and show that a BCL9-targeting peptide promotes anti-tumour immunity in mouse models through targeting macrophages and promoting anti-tumour T cell responses.

explanation: 该论文主要关注城市碳足迹，特别是牲畜供应链对城市碳排放的影响，以及地理因素在其中的作用。虽然碳排放与大气环境相关，但该研究的核心在于农业生产、供应链和城市地理，而非直接利用大气遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析）进行研究。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Benjamin P. Goldstein;Rylie E. O. Pelton;Dimitrios Gounaridis;Jennifer Schmitt;Nathaniel Springer;Joshua P. Newell
title: Author Correction: The carbon hoofprint of cities is shaped by geography and production in the livestock supply chain
abstract: Author Correction: The carbon hoofprint of cities is shaped by geography and production in the livestock supply chain

explanation: 该论文主要研究南极绕极流（ACC）的动态变化，特别是其北边界的南移现象，以及这种变化如何维持绕极环流的稳定。研究使用了卫星测高数据来分析ACC边界的演变，并发现北边界在过去三十年中显著南移，尤其是在东南太平洋地区。尽管东向流动加强并集中在移动的北边界附近，但ACC边界内的体积输送量在整个南极绕极海洋中保持稳定。加强的流动被重新导向到亚热带环流，从而加强了南大洋超级环流，同时保持了稳定的ACC输送。该研究旨在解决更强的纬向流动与稳定的ACC输送共存的悖论，并深入了解南大洋动力学变化及其对气候的影响。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Chunhu Xie;Jiuxin Shi;Dapeng Li;Yongming Sun;Jindong Jiang;Guy D. Williams
title: Southward shift of the Antarctic Circumpolar Current upstream of Drake Passage maintains a stable circumpolar transport
abstract:
Climate change is altering the strength and position of Southern Ocean westerly winds but the ocean transport is stable. Here the authors use sea surface height to show that a poleward shift of the northern boundary and changing dynamics maintain the circumpolar transport. 
 Over recent decades, the Southern Ocean’s westerly winds have intensified and shifted poleward, whereas the Antarctic Circumpolar Current (ACC) transport through the Drake Passage has remained stable. Here using satellite altimetry data, we define the interannual evolution of the ACC’s dynamical boundaries and identify a significant southward shift of its Northern Boundary (NB) over the past three decades, with the most rapid migration (up to 1.1° per decade) occurring in the Southeast Pacific. Ocean reanalysis confirms that volume transport within the ACC’s boundaries remains stable across the circumpolar Southern Ocean, despite a strengthening eastward flow concentrated near the migrating NB. The migrating NB redirects this intensified flow into the subtropical gyre, strengthening the Southern Ocean supergyre while maintaining stable ACC transport. These results resolve the paradox of stronger zonal flows coexisting with stable ACC transport, providing insight into changing Southern Ocean dynamics and their climate implications. Climate change is altering the strength and position of Southern Ocean westerly winds but the ocean transport is stable. Here the authors use sea surface height to show that a poleward shift of the northern boundary and changing dynamics maintain the circumpolar transport.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要主要关注武装冲突与生物多样性之间的关系。虽然环境因素可能在武装冲突中起作用，并且生物多样性可能受到大气环境变化的影响，但该研究的核心并非直接探讨大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Pedro Romero-Vidal;Luis Flores;Prince Kaleme;Radar Nishuli;José L. Tella
title: Armed conflicts and biodiversity research
abstract: Armed conflicts and biodiversity research

explanation: 该论文主要讨论了催化水处理的最佳实践，旨在弥合实验室研究与实际应用之间的差距。重点在于催化剂测试的标准化和严格化，以促进催化工艺在水处理领域的工业应用。与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Claire Chouinard;Paul Westerhoff;Jae-Hong Kim
title: Best practices for catalytic water treatment
abstract:
Although catalytic processes offer a low-cost, low-energy alternative to traditional water treatment methods, they still face a lack of industrial adoption. Here we recommend standardized rigorous practices on the catalyst testing to bridge the gap between laboratory research and practical application. 
 Although catalytic processes offer a low-cost, low-energy alternative to traditional water treatment methods, they still face a lack of industrial adoption. Here we recommend standardized rigorous practices on the catalyst testing to bridge the gap between laboratory research and practical application.

explanation: 该论文的标题和摘要主要关注通过增加物质存量（如建筑物、基础设施和机械）来实现全球体面的生活水平。它侧重于社会经济发展和资源分配，而不是大气环境遥感技术。因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等主题没有直接关系。该研究旨在探讨如何在当前建设速度下，到2030年通过适度的物质积累来实现普遍的体面生活水平。
title: Global decent living standards could be achieved by moderate build-up of material stocks
abstract:
Global inequalities leave billions without the services necessary for a decent living standard. Our analysis suggests that even moderate additions to societies’ material stocks in buildings, infrastructure and machinery could secure universal decent living standards, by 2030 at current construction rates. 
 Global inequalities leave billions without the services necessary for a decent living standard. Our analysis suggests that even moderate additions to societies’ material stocks in buildings, infrastructure and machinery could secure universal decent living standards, by 2030 at current construction rates.

explanation: 该论文主要研究了改进地形重力波拖曳参数化方案对青藏高原夏季降水的影响。通过在WRF模型中考虑饱和空气的湿度效应，发现改进后的方案可以减少青藏高原东南部的降水和湿偏差。研究重点在于气候模拟和区域气候模式的改进，而非大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['Orographic Gravity Wave Drag', 'Tibetan Plateau Rainfall', 'Monsoon Circulation', 'Weather Research and Forecasting Model']
authors: Yingjie Wang;Xin Xu;Xiangrong Yang;Peng Wei;Congyuan Li;Jianping Wu;Kaijun Ren
title: Moist orographic gravity wave drag parameterization reduces the bias of summer rainfall over the Tibetan Plateau
abstract:
Moist orographic gravity wave drag parameterization reduces the bias of summer rainfall over the Tibetan Plateau 
 Summer precipitation over the Tibetan Plateau (TP) significantly affects the regional and global climate. In this paper, the orographic gravity wave drag (OGWD) parameterization is revised by incorporating the moisture effect of saturated air into the Weather Research and Forecasting model. Seasonal simulations are performed for the summer rainfall over the TP during 2003–2023 employing the original and modified OGWD schemes. The results indicate that the rainfall and thus the wet biases over the southeastern TP are reduced when the moist OGWD scheme is employed. The moisture effect first enhances the lower-tropospheric OGWD over the Indian Peninsula, thereby weakening the low-level winds. The decrease in the horizontal wind speed leads to a reduction of the surface gravity wave momentum flux and thus the OGWD, which in turn strengthens the low-level flow. The latter process initiates intensification of the monsoon circulation over the Bay of Bengal (BOB). During mid-to-late summer, the monsoon circulation is continuously intensified through the circulation–precipitation interaction. The enhanced cyclonic circulation over the BOB induces an easterly flow to the south of the TP, which is opposed to the climatological southwesterly monsoon circulation. Therefore, the water vapor transport toward the TP is decreased.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注气候变化背景下热带地区（ENSO）与北极地区春季气温之间的遥相关关系的反转现象。研究重点在于ENSO如何影响北极地区的温度变化，以及这种影响在不同时期如何发生变化。研究分析了大气环流、地势高度、热量和水汽输送等因素在其中的作用。虽然涉及大气过程，但论文的核心并非直接关于大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析，而是侧重于气候变化对区域气候遥相关模式的影响。
topic_words: ['El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO)', 'Arctic temperature', 'Teleconnection', 'Climate change', 'Geopotential height', 'Atmospheric heat transport', 'Water vapor transport', 'Westerly jet']
authors: Wenchao Tang;Bo Sun;Noel Keenlyside;Fei Li;Shengping He;Hua Li;Botao Zhou;Huijun Wang
title: Reversed tropical-Arctic teleconnection under climate change
abstract:
Reversed tropical-Arctic teleconnection under climate change 
 Arctic spring surface air temperature (SAT), as a critical climate indicator of spring climate change in the region, exhibits notable interannual variability amid rapid Arctic warming. However, the extent to which this variability is linked to the tropics remains unclear. This study identifies a reversal of the interannual relationship between winter (December–January–February) El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO) and subsequent spring (March–April–May) Arctic temperatures during recent decades. During the negative impact period, Arctic geopotential height anomalies associated with ENSO led to negative anomalies in atmospheric heat and water vapor transport from mid-latitudes to the Arctic, ultimately resulting in the cooling of Arctic SAT. In contrast, during the positive impact period, Arctic geopotential height anomalies linked to ENSO generated positive anomalies in atmospheric heat and water vapor transport from mid-latitudes to the Arctic, consequently resulting in Arctic SAT warming. The varying responses of high-latitude atmospheric circulation to ENSO during different periods are key drivers of the reversal in the tropical-Arctic teleconnection, which is closely tied to changes in the climatic state of the westerly jet induced by SST under climate change. This study advances understanding of the interannual variability mechanism of Arctic spring climate in the context of climate change and offers new insights into improving predictive capabilities.

explanation: 该论文主要关注全球变暖背景下大西洋经向翻转环流（AMOC）减弱对巴西降水的影响，包括亚马逊地区的干旱化和东北部地区的降水变化。研究重点在于气候模型对AMOC减弱程度的预测不确定性，以及这种不确定性如何影响巴西的降水模式。虽然涉及气候变化和大气过程，但与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。该研究更侧重于气候模拟和区域气候变化的影响，而非遥感技术的应用。
authors: I. Vilela;P. De Luca;S. Koseki;T. Silva;D. Veleda;N. Keenlyside
title: AMOC weakening modulates global warming impacts on precipitation over Brazil
abstract:
AMOC weakening modulates global warming impacts on precipitation over Brazil 
 Global warming is expected to substantially weaken the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC). However, climate models disagree greatly on the magnitude of AMOC weakening. This adds uncertainties in climate change projections, across the globe, through influencing poleward ocean and atmospheric energy transports. Here, we show through multi-model analysis of future climate change projections that AMOC weakening during this century will strongly influence precipitation and its extremes over Brazil. Such weakening dominates over the direct global warming impacts, causing drying in the Amazon, while completely mitigating them in northeast Brazil. We trace this to a tropical Atlantic warming, consistent with weakened heat transport along the southern branch of the South Equatorial Current. This induces a cross-equatorial sea surface temperature gradient and changes in latent heat flux, shifting the intertropical convergence zone southward. Our findings highlight the need to reduce uncertainties in the AMOC response to global warming and its oceanic mediated influences on Brazilian climate.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注全球变暖背景下热带太平洋海面温度（SST）的变化模式，特别是厄尔尼诺（El Niño）和拉尼娜（La Niña）现象。研究发现，由于气候模型中对厄尔尼诺-南方涛动（ENSO）不对称性的模拟不准确，传统方法可能会低估类似厄尔尼诺的变暖。该研究提出了一种新的框架来分离ENSO不对称性相关的整流效应，并发现ENSO不对称性在全球变暖下减弱，导致类似拉尼娜的影响。因此，这篇论文主要关注气候变化和海洋现象，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接的强相关性。
topic_words: ['El Niño', 'La Niña', 'Sea Surface Temperature', 'Climate Models', 'Global Warming', 'ENSO', 'Tropical Pacific', 'Cloud Radiative Processes', 'Atmospheric Convection']
authors: Yue Chen;Ping Huang;Jun Ying
title: El Niño-like warming underestimated in a warmer climate due to ENSO rectification effect
abstract:
El Niño-like warming underestimated in a warmer climate due to ENSO rectification effect 
 Whether the tropical Pacific sea surface temperature (SST) warming pattern under global warming resembles El Niño or La Niña remains uncertain, partly due to unrealistically simulated El Niño–Southern Oscillation (ENSO) asymmetry in climate models. Here, using a newly defined normalized mean state framework, we isolate the ENSO asymmetry-related rectification effect and find that traditional methods underestimate El Niño-like warming by 14.5% ± 11.9% because ENSO asymmetry weakens under global warming. This asymmetry reduction induces La Niña-like influences through cloud radiative and atmospheric convection processes in the equatorial western Pacific. The contribution of ENSO rectification to warming patterns correlates with simulated historical ENSO asymmetry in climate models. These findings clarify how ENSO nonlinearity shapes tropical Pacific warming patterns and provide an improved framework for climate projections.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注北极海冰减少对印度支那半岛季风退却的影响，以及由此导致的秋季降水增加。它侧重于气候模式、大气环流和区域季风动力学，而非直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。虽然研究中使用了再分析数据和观测数据集，但其核心在于气候变化对季风系统的影响机制分析。
topic_words: ['Monsoon dynamics', 'Arctic sea ice loss', 'Climate modeling', 'Precipitation patterns', 'Atmospheric circulation']
authors: Yilin Duo;Jie Zhang
title: Arctic ice loss is delaying monsoon retreat over the Indochina Peninsula
abstract:
Arctic ice loss is delaying monsoon retreat over the Indochina Peninsula 
 Warming and extreme precipitation events frequently occur in the Asian summer monsoon during autumn, and their causes are still unclear. In this study, we investigate variations in the monsoon and autumn precipitation over the Indochina Peninsula (ICP) using reanalysis data, observational datasets, and ensemble simulations from the CMIP6 Polar Amplification Model Intercomparison Project (PAMIP). The results show that from 2005 to 2023, a delayed retreat of the ICP monsoon led to increased autumn precipitation. Arctic sea ice loss associated with Arctic amplification is identified as one of the primary forcing factors. Reduced Arctic sea ice influences the North Atlantic Oscillation (NAO) and the tripole sea surface temperature (SST) pattern, which in turn excite Rossby wave sources in the mid-latitude North Atlantic. The resulting wave train propagates from Western Europe to Asia, inducing an anomalous anticyclone extending from Asia to the Western Pacific and promoting a northward displacement of the South Asian High (SAH). This shift drives a northward movement of the East Asian Subtropical Jet (EASJ) and the Western Pacific Subtropical High (WPSH). The SAH “pumping” enhances mid-tropospheric latent heat release and surface warming, strengthening the land–sea thermal contrast, thereby intensifying the monsoon circulation and delaying its retreat. These circulation changes enhance moisture convergence, increasing autumn precipitation over the ICP, highlighting the critical role of Arctic sea ice loss in modulating regional monsoon dynamics.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究使用人工智能技术，特别是神经网络分类方法，通过分析CMIP6气候模型的每日海平面气压（SLP）地图来识别不同的气候模型。研究发现，在夏季模型的可识别性较高，并基于此识别出气候模型家族，并探讨了气候变化如何影响21世纪末的SLP日常模式。该研究的重点在于气候模型的识别和气候变化的影响，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
topic_words: ['Climate models', 'SLP (Sea Level Pressure)', 'Neural network classification', 'CMIP6', 'North Atlantic', 'Climate change']
authors: Pascal Yiou;Soulivanh Thao
title: Using artificial intelligence to identify CMIP6 models from daily SLP maps
abstract:
Using artificial intelligence to identify CMIP6 models from daily SLP maps 
 The chaotic nature of the climate has motivated the production of large ensembles of simulations. To exploit those ensembles for impact or attribution studies, models are either considered separately or pooled together to increase the statistical significance of the results. The latter assumes that models are interchangeable. Care is necessary when fields, like temperature, yield obvious biases. Synoptic fields like SLP do not yield obvious biases, which might justify their use to enrich reanalysis data. Here, we examine this hypothesis through a neural network classification approach. The goal is to determine whether it is possible to recognize a climate model from a single SLP map over the North Atlantic. We find that models are highly identifiable in the summer (and less so in other seasons). From this classification, we identify families of climate models and investigate how climate change can affect SLP daily patterns toward the end of the 21st century. This study allows identifying which climate models could be used as input for AI-based forecasts.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注北大西洋的淡水强迫对大西洋经向翻转环流（AMOC）和热带地区气候的影响，特别是北大西洋副热带环流如何将高纬度地区的信号传递到热带地区，以及这些变化如何影响热带大西洋的ITCZ。虽然研究涉及海表温度（SST）和风场等大气变量，但其核心在于海洋环流和气候的相互作用，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Rajat Joshi;Rong Zhang
title: On the Atlantic extratropical-tropical teleconnection in response to external freshwater forcing
abstract:
On the Atlantic extratropical-tropical teleconnection in response to external freshwater forcing 
 We investigate key mechanisms driving the Atlantic extratropical-tropical teleconnection and associated Atlantic Intertropical Convergence Zone (ITCZ) shift in boreal summer under a strong external freshwater forcing using a coupled climate model. Our analysis reveals that the wind-evaporation-sea surface temperature (SST) feedback is not the primary mechanism. Instead, the southward advection of the upper extratropical North Atlantic signal by the North Atlantic subtropical gyre along a horseshoe pathway is a key mechanism for forming the horseshoe pattern of cold SST anomalies. Additionally, the weakening of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation changes the upper tropical North Atlantic western boundary current. This change is amplified by enhanced surface wind stress curl over the tropical North Atlantic, contributing to warmer tropical Atlantic subsurface thermocline temperature and SST in the tropical South Atlantic. The dipole Atlantic SST anomalies lead to the trade wind response and associated southward ITCZ shift over the tropical Atlantic.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注第三极地区河流径流的变化趋势，特别是受西风带和季风影响的河流。研究分析了过去半个世纪这些河流径流量的变化，并探讨了气候变化背景下径流变化的驱动因素，例如降水、蒸发和冰川融化。虽然气候变化与大气环境有关，但本研究的重点是水文过程和水资源管理，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。
authors: Lei Wang;Xiuping Li;Arthur Lutz;Santosh Nepal;Deliang Chen;Tandong Yao;Fengge Su;Lan Cuo;Zhijun Yao;Yinsheng Zhang;Zhidan Hu;Jingheng Huang;Mei Hou;Ruishun Liu;Junshui Long;Chenhao Chai;Zhaofei Liu;Ahmad Bashir;Sonu Khanal;He Sun;Yong Nie;Yongqiang Zhang;Tao Wang
title: Acceleration of diverging runoff trends on the Third Pole
abstract:
Over the past 50 years, westerlies-dominated rivers on the Third Pole have seen significant increases in mountain-outlet runoff, while monsoon-dominated rivers have seen insignificant declines, requiring proactive adaptations for regional water security, according to observation-based analysis of regional assessment of mountain runoff changes. 
 Quantifying long-term historical changes in river runoff from the vulnerable high-mountain Third Pole is critical for Asia’s water resources planning, but still unresolved from a coherent, regional perspective in the climate change context. Here we show that the mountain-outlet runoff generally experienced significant increases for the westerlies-dominated rivers (Indus, Amu Darya, Syr Darya, Tarim, Heihe, and, Shule) and insignificant declines for the monsoon-dominated rivers (Ganges, Brahmaputra, Mekong, and Salween) in the past half-century, largely driven by the enhanced westerlies and weakened Indian summer monsoon. Although the changing rates of runoff can be mostly explained by the varying precipitation minus evapotranspiration, the total water storage changes (e.g., regional glacier melting, groundwater depletion) cannot be neglected. After the year 1997, the contrasting changes in the westerlies- and monsoon-dominated regions have been remarkably accelerated, necessitating proactive adaptations to sustain regional water, ecology, and food security. Over the past 50 years, westerlies-dominated rivers on the Third Pole have seen significant increases in mountain-outlet runoff, while monsoon-dominated rivers have seen insignificant declines, requiring proactive adaptations for regional water security, according to observation-based analysis of regional assessment of mountain runoff changes.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注的是风力发电场在不同生态系统（森林、草原、沙漠）中的土地利用对温室气体排放和能源绩效的影响。它使用生命周期评估方法来量化土地利用变化对碳排放的影响，并比较了不同生态系统中风力发电场的环境效益。虽然该研究涉及温室气体排放，但它侧重于土地利用和生态系统碳损失，而不是大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
topic_words: ['Life Cycle Assessment', 'Greenhouse Gas Emissions', 'Land Use Change', 'Carbon Footprint', 'Ecosystem Carbon Losses']
authors: Kang Xu;Hanwen Zhu;Shuai Zhang;Mingming Wang;Wei Li;Wenji Zhou;Shuangcheng Li;Zhou Shi;Jinfeng Chang
title: Land use impacts the environmental benefits of wind energy farms in China
abstract:
In China, land-use emissions account for 38 percent of the lifecycle carbon footprint for wind farms in forest ecosystems, but only 4 percent for grasslands and 1 percent for deserts, according to a life cycle assessment method that incorporates ecosystem carbon losses. 
 Wind energy plays a vital role in meeting rising electricity demand and climate goals, but its land-use footprints from vegetation removal, construction, and road sprawl may overestimate greenhouse gas (GHG) mitigation benefits. Here we used life cycle assessment (LCA) to explore the land-use impacts on GHG emissions and energy performance for three typical wind farms located in forest, grassland and desert ecosystems. We incorporated vegetation/soil removal during the installation stage, and the loss of additional carbon sink capacity during the operation and maintenance stage. Land-use change (LUC) contributed 37.9% of the life cycle emissions for the forest farm, while much lower for the grassland and desert farm (4.3% and 1.2%, respectively). Grassland deployment offered a triple win with highest energy return, lowest land-use intensity, and lowest GHG emissions. With mitigation measures, all farms achieved low emission intensity (below 5 g CO2-eq kWh−1), greatly reducing land-use and ecosystem-based emission intensity differences. In China, land-use emissions account for 38 percent of the lifecycle carbon footprint for wind farms in forest ecosystems, but only 4 percent for grasslands and 1 percent for deserts, according to a life cycle assessment method that incorporates ecosystem carbon losses.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注青藏高原的农业实践优化，以实现内部和外部的可持续性效益。虽然提到了温室气体排放，但其重点在于作物和牲畜生产的重新分配如何减少排放、提高农业产量和节约水资源。该研究使用线性优化模型和投入产出方法进行分析，并未直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Chongchong Ye;Shuai Wang;Changjia Li;Lindsay C. Stringer;Xutong Wu;Shaolin Wu;Yuyang Wang
title: Reorienting agricultural practices on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau for internal–external sustainability benefits
abstract:
In the Qinghai Tibetan Plateau, redistributing crop and livestock production could reduce greenhouse gas emissions and phosphorus surplus, increase agricultural output, and save water resources, according to an analysis that uses a linear optimization model and input-output approach. 
 Agricultural practices threaten environmental sustainability at both local and transboundary scales, yet how to optimize them for improved sustainability across these multiple scales remains poorly understood. Here we propose an integrated framework combining safe and just operating spaces, spatial optimization, and extended multiregional Input-Output model to optimize crop-livestock systems on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau for sustainable internal–external outcomes. We show that 6.5% of the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau has exceeded three or more environmental boundaries, but 56.1% of these could be alleviated by reorienting crop and livestock distributions. Such optimizations could reduce greenhouse gas emissions (8.7%) and phosphorus surplus (3.0%), increase agricultural output by 9.5%, and save water resources to benefit downstream areas (1.3%–74.5%), while realizing a reduction of 0.14 megatons of CO2-equivalent, 1.21 kilotons of nitrogen, and 0.22 kilotons of phosphorus emissions outside the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau. This framework underscores the importance of integrated spatial planning for achieving sustainability at local and transboundary scales. In the Qinghai Tibetan Plateau, redistributing crop and livestock production could reduce greenhouse gas emissions and phosphorus surplus, increase agricultural output, and save water resources, according to an analysis that uses a linear optimization model and input-output approach.

explanation: 该论文主要研究月球陨石中在高压冲击下形成的矿物，以及冲击过程中产生的金属铁。研究重点在于月球撞击历史、极端条件下的物质行为，以及月球铁的来源。与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Lixin Gu;Nian Wang;Yangting Lin;Hengci Tian;Xu Tang;Zhan Zhou;Xiaoguang Li;Lihui Jia;Yuchen Xu;Sen Hu;Jinhua Li
title: Abundant high-pressure minerals and submicroscopic metallic iron discovered in a shocked lunar meteorite
abstract:
Abundant high pressure mineral phases are identified using electron microscopy and Raman data in the lunar meteorite Northwest Africa 3170 alongside metallic iron which suggests intense shock metamorphism as a source of lunar iron. 
 Although the Moon’s surface is covered by countless impact craters, high-pressure phases are rare in lunar samples, limiting our understanding of impact history and their associated shock effects. Here we report abundant high-pressure minerals in the highly shocked lunar meteorite Northwest Africa 3170, six of which are found for the first time in lunar samples, including ahrensite, tuite, xieite, majorite, majorite-pyrope and vitrified bridgmanite, in addition to previously identified phases such as stishovite, seifertite, and ringwoodite. This mineral assemblage indicates intense shock metamorphism (~22–24 GPa and ~ 2000 °C) and rapid cooling (quench time < 15 ms). Notably, substantial amounts of submicroscopic metallic iron were generated during impact rather than through space weathering, implying that large-scale impacts may have contributed significantly to metallic iron on the Moon. These findings offer new perspectives on the impact history of the Moon and the behavior of materials under extreme conditions. Abundant high pressure mineral phases are identified using electron microscopy and Raman data in the lunar meteorite Northwest Africa 3170 alongside metallic iron which suggests intense shock metamorphism as a source of lunar iron.

explanation: 该论文主要关注矿物热压计的可靠性，通过热力学和统计学方法分析不确定性来源，并评估其对压力和温度估计的影响。研究重点在于改进矿物热压计模型，而非大气环境遥感技术。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Xudong Wang;Tong Hou;Penny E. Wieser;Zhaochong Zhang
title: Thermodynamic insights into the reliability of mineral-based thermobarometers
abstract:
The next generation of mineral thermobarometers will need to be thermodynamically rigorous, statistically robust and experimentally calibrated, according to an evaluation of how uncertainties and model parameters in the jadeite thermobarometer influence P-T estimates. 
 To understand magmatic processes within the silicate planets, accurate pressure and temperature estimates are essential. These conditions are often measured using thermobarometers based on mineral equilibria, but their precision is limited, particularly for barometers, with standard error estimates often exceeding 200 megapascals. Here we present an approach combining thermodynamics and statistics to rigorously investigate these uncertainties. Uncertainty propagation and Sobol analysis reveal that thermometer uncertainties are primarily driven by compositional analytical uncertainty, while barometer uncertainties are dominated by model parameters. Given the quality of current calibration data, even a perfect thermodynamic model has a built-in minimum uncertainty of 120–240 megapascals for barometer and 22–41 °C for thermometer. Furthermore, we demonstrate that pressure and temperature estimates are interdependent; an error in one inevitably compromises the other. Our work provides a pathway for building more reliable thermobarometric models and underscores the need for new, high-quality experimental data. The next generation of mineral thermobarometers will need to be thermodynamically rigorous, statistically robust and experimentally calibrated, according to an evaluation of how uncertainties and model parameters in the jadeite thermobarometer influence P-T estimates.

explanation: 该论文主要研究2024年乌什地震的断层结构和破裂机制，重点在于地震地质学和构造地质学。通过分析地震、地质和地质测量数据，揭示了主断层和次断层的破裂特征，以及构造继承对断层几何结构的影响。与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，没有直接关联。
authors: Xinzhong Yin;Tao Li;Yingfeng Zhang;Zhigang Peng;Luca Dal Zilio;Zhuxin Chen;Huawei Cui;Li Qian;Xiao Sun;Renqi Lu;Biao Guo;Wenxin Yang;Jiuhui Chen;Jie Chen
title: Interlacing ruptures of the 2024 Wushi earthquake (Chinese Tian Shan) controlled by structural inheritance
abstract:
The 2024 Wushi earthquake ruptured an oblique-reverse network of subsidiary faults, which hosted the majority of aftershocks and generated surface rupture, while the mainshock did not, according to an analysis of local seismic, geodetic and field data. 
 The 2024 Mw 7.0 Wushi earthquake is the largest earthquake within the seismically active Tian Shan during the past three decades. Through integrated analyses of seismic, geodetic, and geologic data, here we investigate the fault structure corresponding to the Wushi mainshock and subsequent aftershocks. Our work reveals (i) a moderately-dipping, oblique-reverse main-fault rupture and (ii) numerous steeply to vertically-dipping subfault ruptures that align obliquely in cross-section to the main fault. The subfaults made clear aftershock concentrations while the main fault did not, and a shallowly-buried subfault generated clear surface rupture despite the main fault being totally blind. This fault network, misoriented with the prevailing background stress field, likely forms through a reactivation of inherited planes of weakness. These results demonstrate the significant control of structural inheritance on fault geometric architecture and highlight the complexity of seismic activity and rupture behavior of the yielding fault network. The 2024 Wushi earthquake ruptured an oblique-reverse network of subsidiary faults, which hosted the majority of aftershocks and generated surface rupture, while the mainshock did not, according to an analysis of local seismic, geodetic and field data.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注的是在古元古代时期（大约25亿至21亿年前）地球大气氧气水平的演变，特别是通过分析加拿大休伦超群中埃斯帕诺拉和蛇形地层的沉积岩的地球化学和同位素组成，来推断当时地壳硫化物氧化的程度。研究结果表明，在休伦冰期之前，地壳硫化物的氧化风化程度有限，这暗示了当时大气氧气水平较低。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系，而更多地属于地球化学和古气候研究领域。
authors: Kosuke T. Goto;Yasuhito Sekine;Umi Nakamura;Katsuhiko Suzuki;Ryoko Senda;Naoki Yamada;Yuichiro Ueno;Shogo Tachibana;Naohiro Yoshida;Mariko Harada;Ryuji Tada;Kazuhisa Goto;Shinji Yamamoto;Teruyuki Maruoka;Nanako O. Ogawa;Naohiko Ohkouchi;Yumiko Harigane;Yoshiaki Kon;Gen Shimoda;Simon W. Poulton;Eiichi Tajika
title: Incomplete oxidative sulfide weathering and low atmospheric oxygen levels during the Great Oxidation Event
abstract:
Limited oxidative weathering of crustal sulfide before the Gowganda glaciation suggests low atmospheric oxygen levels persisted long before the final Huronian glaciation, according to a geochemical and isotopic analysis of the upper Espanola and Serpent formations in Canada. 
 Multiple lines of evidence support permanent oxygenation of the Earth’s atmosphere during the early Paleoproterozoic (~2.5–2.1 billion years ago). Here, we report geochemical data, along with sulfide textures, for >2.31-bilion-year-old sedimentary rocks from the upper Espanola and Serpent formations that underlie the third glacial diamictite of the Huronian Supergroup, Canada. Redox-sensitive element contents and the isotopic compositions of molybdenum and sulfur are comparable to upper continental crust value. Subangular to rounded pyrite grains of detrital origin are observed in sandstones of the Serpent Formation. Our data indicate limited oxidative weathering of crustal sulfide prior to the third glaciation of the Huronian succession, consistent with low atmospheric oxygen levels (<5×10−4 of the present atmospheric level). We suggest that such low atmospheric oxygen levels persisted for long periods prior to the final glaciation of the Huronian succession. Limited oxidative weathering of crustal sulfide before the Gowganda glaciation suggests low atmospheric oxygen levels persisted long before the final Huronian glaciation, according to a geochemical and isotopic analysis of the upper Espanola and Serpent formations in Canada.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注北极地区陆地有机碳（terrOC）从冻土层释放到沿海浅水区的过程，以及其在这些区域的迁移、转化和储存。研究重点是加拿大博福特海的浅水区，探讨了陆地有机碳与矿物基质之间的相互作用。虽然该研究与碳循环有关，但它主要侧重于水文和生物地球化学过程，而非大气环境遥感技术。因此，它与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等大气遥感技术没有直接关联。
authors: F. C. J. van Crimpen;L. Madaj;J. M. van Genuchten;T. Tesi;D. Whalen;K. Scharffenberg;L. Bröder;M. Fritz;J. E. Vonk
title: Shallow coastal zones are key mediators in Arctic land-ocean carbon fluxes
abstract:
The Arctic is undergoing extreme changes due to rapid warming, impacting the carbon cycle and global climate. Permafrost holds about 1,300 billion tons of carbon. Along the Arctic coasts, this terrestrial organic carbon (terrOC) is released into coastal waters upon thaw and erosion, where it can then be broken down into CO₂ or buried. Understanding its transport, redistribution, and storage is crucial for predicting its eventual climate feedback. This study focuses on the shallow coastal zones ( < 5 m depth) of the Canadian Beaufort Sea, the first receptor of terrOC. Using a transect-based sampling approach, we analysed the interplay between terrOC and the mineral matrix in sediments and surface waters to show how terrOC moves and changes from the coast to the marine shelf sea. We found that terrOC is primarily mineral-free material (plant residues) and is hydrodynamically trapped – and possibly degraded – in these shallow waters. At greater depths, only a small fraction of this material remains, implying that this region is an overlooked biogeochemical reactor. This research addresses a critical gap in data from shallow Arctic coastal zones and thereby helps us to better understand the fate of carbon from eroding permafrost coasts. 
 Rapid Arctic warming accelerates the erosion of permafrost coasts rich in terrestrial organic carbon (terrOC). Once released into the ocean, terrOC can degrade or get buried in shelf sediments, yet its transport pathways and fate remain poorly understood. We collected permafrost material, sediment and surface water along the Canadian Beaufort Sea coast, fractionating samples by density (cut-off 1.8 g/cm3) and size (38, 63 and 200 µm) before performing geochemical and microscopic analysis. Our results show that ~43% of terrOC is trapped in low-density fractions, mainly as vascular plant debris. Surprisingly, this material is trapped within shallow (0-5 m) waters where waterlogging and large particle size increase its density and settling velocity. Less than 10% is transported to deeper waters (30-55 m), indicating that the shallow coastal zone acts as a trap and biogeochemical reactor. These findings challenge the source-to-sink paradigm and highlight the overlooked and undersampled ( < 6% of pan-arctic shelf data) nearshore zone. The Arctic is undergoing extreme changes due to rapid warming, impacting the carbon cycle and global climate. Permafrost holds about 1,300 billion tons of carbon. Along the Arctic coasts, this terrestrial organic carbon (terrOC) is released into coastal waters upon thaw and erosion, where it can then be broken down into CO₂ or buried. Understanding its transport, redistribution, and storage is crucial for predicting its eventual climate feedback. This study focuses on the shallow coastal zones ( < 5 m depth) of the Canadian Beaufort Sea, the first receptor of terrOC. Using a transect-based sampling approach, we analysed the interplay between terrOC and the mineral matrix in sediments and surface waters to show how terrOC moves and changes from the coast to the marine shelf sea. We found that terrOC is primarily mineral-free material (plant residues) and is hydrodynamically trapped – and possibly degraded – in these shallow waters. At greater depths, only a small fraction of this material remains, implying that this region is an overlooked biogeochemical reactor. This research addresses a critical gap in data from shallow Arctic coastal zones and thereby helps us to better understand the fate of carbon from eroding permafrost coasts. Eroding Arctic permafrost along the Canadian Beaufort Sea coasts hold large amounts of vascular plant debris, which in turn hold large amounts of terrestrial organic carbon, according to analyses of sampled permafrost material, sediment, and surface water.

explanation: 该论文主要关注高分辨率地球观测产品在水文模型中的应用，评估了降水、积雪面积、土壤湿度和蒸散等水文变量的遥感产品性能，并推荐了适用于欧洲地区高分辨率水文建模的产品。虽然使用了卫星数据（如MODIS、Sentinel-2、Landsat-8、SMAP），但其重点在于水文过程模拟，而非大气环境遥感，如空气质量监测或大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['hydrological modelling', 'precipitation products', 'snow cover area products', 'surface soil moisture products', 'evapotranspiration products', 'MODIS', 'Sentinel-2', 'Landsat-8', 'SMAP', 'IMERG', 'ERA5', 'ETMonitor', 'ALEXI', 'HOLAPS']
authors: Almudena García-García;Pietro Stradiotti;Federico Di Paolo;Paolo Filippucci;Milan Fischer;Matěj Orság;Luca Brocca;Jian Peng;Wouter Dorigo;Alexander Gruber;Bram Droppers;Niko Wanders;Arjen Haag;Albrecht Weerts;Ehsan Modiri;Oldrich Rakovec;Félix Francés;Matteo Dall’Amico;Martha Anderson;Christopher Hain
title: Intercomparison of Earth Observation products for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling over Europe
abstract:
•Assessment of high-resolution EO products addressing hydrological modelling needs. •High-resolution precipitation products reach the best performance metrics. •No conclusive evidence of improved performance in high-resolution SSM and ET products. •Recommendations for the integration of EO in hyper-resolution hydrological modelling. 
 The increasing frequency and severity of hydrological extremes demand the development of early warning systems and effective adaptation and mitigation strategies. Such systems and strategies require spatially detailed hydrological predictions, mostly provided by hydrological models. However, current state-of-the-art hydrological predictions remain limited in their spatial resolution. A proposed solution is the integration of high-resolution (<1 km) Earth observation (EO) products in hydrological modelling in order to reach hyper-resolution (approximately 1 km2). Nonetheless, proper use of these data in hydrological modelling requires a comprehensive characterization of their uncertainties. Here, we evaluate the performance of high-resolution EO products of four hydrological variables (7 precipitation products, 5 snow cover area products, 6 surface soil moisture products, and 6 actual evapotranspiration products) against observational references. Two merged EO precipitation products at 1 km resolution (merged IMERG-SM2A and merged ERA5-IMERG-SM2A) reached correlation coefficients >0.5 with the benchmark reference over most areas and are recommended for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling over Europe. The MODIS (resolution of 250 m) and Sentinel-2/Landsat-8 (resolution of 20/30 m) snow cover products showed the highest classification accuracy and were selected as the best choice for the use of snow cover area products in hyper-resolution hydrological modelling. For surface soil moisture, the NSIDC SMAP product at 1 km resolution yielded correlation coefficients >0.6 at most stations and is recommended for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling. Finally, evapotranspiration products showed similar performances at the selected flux sites (correlations coefficients > 0.8). While the MODIS-Terra/Aqua evapotranspiration products (MOD16A2/MYD16A2) offer higher spatial resolution (500 m), making them potentially advantageous for hyper-resolution hydrological modelling, their temporal resolution is coarser (8-day intervals). In contrast, products like ETMonitor (1 km), ALEXI, and HOLAPS (5 km) provide daily estimates, albeit at lower spatial resolution. The assimilation of the proposed high-resolution products in models individually or in combination could lead us to hyper-resolution hydrological modelling. Still, developing integration workflows is required to overcome difficulties related to scale mismatches and data-gaps.

explanation: 这篇论文主要关注的是利用遥感技术进行农作物生长进程的估计，特别是在缺乏地面调查数据的区域。它通过结合已调查区域的真实数据和为未调查区域生成的合成数据，训练神经网络来提高作物生长进程估计的准确性。该研究侧重于农业遥感应用，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测大气成分分析等）没有直接关联。
authors: George Worrall;Jasmeet Judge
title: In-season crop progress in unsurveyed regions using networks trained on synthetic data
abstract:
•Current remote sensing crop progress estimation (CPE) relies on ground survey data. •Existing satellite-based CPE methods cannot be used in unsurveyed regions (UR). •Linked weather-crop-optical radiative transfer models provide synthetic data for UR. •NNs can be trained on synthetic data and real CP data from surveyed regions (SR). •NNs trained on simultaneously on CP from SR and synthetic data improves CPE in UR. 
 Many commodity crops have growth stages during which they are particularly vulnerable to stress-induced yield loss. In-season crop progress information is useful for quantifying crop risk, and satellite remote sensing (RS) can be used to track progress at regional scales. At present, all existing RS-based crop progress estimation (CPE) methods which target crop-specific stages rely on ground truth data for training/calibration. Such data are collected via field trials or surveys. This reliance on ground survey data confines CPE methods to surveyed regions, limiting their utility. In this study, a new method is developed for conducting RS-based in-season CPE in unsurveyed regions by combining data from surveyed regions with synthetic crop progress data generated for an unsurveyed region of interest. Corn-growing zones in Argentina were used as surrogate ‘unsurveyed’ regions. These zones have climates and dual planting systems which differ from the single planting system in the US Midwest – the surveyed region in this study. Existing weather generation, crop growth, and optical radiative transfer models were linked to produce synthetic weather, crop progress, and canopy reflectance data. These data mimic weather, cultivars, and cropping practices in the unsurveyed region. A neural network (NN) method based upon bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory was trained separately on surveyed data, synthetic data, and two different combinations of surveyed and synthetic data. In the absence of real validation data in unsurveyed regions, a stopping criterion was developed which uses the weighted divergence of surveyed and synthetic data validation loss. F1 score was modified to measure CPE accuracy when the NN was trained on each data combination, with scores based on over- and under-estimates of crop progress throughout the season. Including synthetic data during training improved performance in 9 out of 11 corn-growing zones in Argentina. Net F1 scores across all crop progress stages increased by 8.7% when trained on a combination of surveyed region and synthetic data, and overall performance was only 21% lower than when the NN was trained on surveyed data and applied in the US Midwest. Performance gain from synthetic data was greatest in zones with dual planting windows, while the inclusion of surveyed region data from the US Midwest helped mitigate NN sensitivity to noise in NDVI data. Overall results suggest in-season CPE in other unsurveyed regions may be possible with increased quantity and variety of synthetic crop progress data.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注使用遥感技术（特别是L波段和C波段的合成孔径雷达(SAR)）来检测热带地区的早期森林砍伐。研究比较了不同雷达传感器在森林砍伐不同阶段的探测能力，重点在于早期森林砍伐的检测。论文发现L波段SAR对早期森林砍伐更敏感，而C波段SAR在检测后期森林砍伐阶段更有效。该研究旨在为未来的多组件森林监测系统提供信息，但与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关系。
authors: Africa I. Flores-Anderson;Jeffrey A. Cardille;Josef Kellndorfer;Franz J. Meyer;Pontus Olofsson
title: On the sensitivity of SAR C- and L-band dual-polarized data for detection of early deforestation in the tropics
abstract:
•Early deforestation is detectable by L-band SAR RFDI, even when logged trees remain. •Decision trees from L-band SAR RFDI capture early deforestation in tropical area. •C-band SAR lacks sensitivity to early deforestation in tropical area. •L-band and C-band SAR have complementary strengths for detecting land-cover change. 
 Operational national forest monitoring requires frequent, reliable observations for timely detection of deforestation and other forest changes. However, tropical forests, which encompass all current major deforestation fronts, are often hampered by persistent cloud cover. While radar remote sensing offers a compelling complement to optical data, a significant research gap remains in distinguishing the strengths and limitations of different radar sensors to the multiple stages of forest disturbance. Given the impending rapid expansion of available data outside the C band, it is imperative to assess the ability of these sensors to rapidly and accurately detect changes of high importance to the remote sensing community.To address this gap, we investigated the sensitivity of two freely available radar datasets — JAXA’s ALOS-2 PALSAR-2 (L-band) and ESA’s Sentinel-1 (C-band) — to distinct stages of tropical forest loss. With a particular focus on detecting the earliest stage of deforestation, we compared backscatter values, SAR indices, and statistical metrics against time series data from 92 locations over three years in the Amazon. In these locations, early deforestation, biomass burning, and vegetation regrowth were occurring in different stages of the full conversion process. Our analysis revealed that the L-band-derived Radar Forest Degradation Index (RFDI) is highly sensitive to early deforestation, even when biomass remains on the ground soon after cutting. In contrast, C-band information showed limited ability to sense this critical initial stage of change, but was much stronger at detecting later deforestation stages. Our results point the way toward combining information from the upcoming L-Band NISAR mission with the existing C-band information to produce a multi-component system that can accurately detect deforestation in all its temporal stages.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注遥感数据的时空融合技术，旨在提高遥感图像重建的质量和可靠性。它提出了一种改进的ROBOT模型（iROBOT），通过优化算法和数据处理方法，减少块状伪影和云层干扰，从而更准确地重建遥感图像。虽然该技术可以应用于各种遥感领域，但论文本身并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术的具体应用，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性不强。
authors: Dizhou Guo;Zhenhong Li;Qianqian Jia;Ming Hao
title: An improved ROBust OpTimization-based (iROBOT) fusion model for reliable spatiotemporal seamless remote sensing data reconstruction
abstract:
•iROBOT is proposed as an improved version of the ROBOT fusion model for spatiotemporal reconstruction. •It replaces fixed rectangular blocks with spectrally and spatially homogeneous segments to suppress block artifacts. •An adaptive gap-filling strategy, coupled with low-quality information detection, is introduced to improve robustness under cloud-affected conditions. •Experiments across two representative areas show consistent improvements over ROBOT, OL-HSTFM, and FSDAF. •It achieves higher accuracy while maintaining efficiency, supporting reliable seamless data cube reconstruction at global scales. 
 Spatiotemporal fusion is recognized as a feasible approach for reconstructing high spatiotemporal resolution remote sensing imagery. The recently proposed ROBust OpTimization-based (ROBOT) fusion model has attracted attention for its efficiency, accuracy, and simple parameterization, and has been applied to seamless global data cube reconstruction. However, its sliding-window strategy often leads to block artifacts, while cloud contamination in auxiliary images further degrade the reconstruction quality and reliability. To address these limitations, this study proposes an improved version of ROBOT (iROBOT). By replacing fixed rectangular patches with spectrally and spatially homogeneous segments, iROBOT effectively suppresses block artifacts and better preserves structural details. In addition, an adaptive gap-filling strategy is applied to temporally nearest auxiliary images prior to fusion, and a low-quality information detection module is introduced to filter unreliable cloud-contaminated data from the regression and residual allocation steps, thereby enhancing reliability under cloud contamination. A total of 28 experiments conducted across two representative areas demonstrate that iROBOT consistently outperforms ROBOT, OL-HSTFM, and FSDAF under both cloud-free and cloud-contaminated scenarios. Moreover, compared with ROBOT, iROBOT exhibits superior capability in selecting reliable information from multi-temporal auxiliary images, with its accuracy advantage becoming more pronounced as the number of auxiliary inputs increases, and with notably enhanced robustness in cloud-prone environments. These findings highlight the potential of iROBOT for improving the accuracy of global-scale spatiotemporal image reconstruction. Code is found at https://github.com/Andy-cumt/iROBOT_spatiotemporal-fusion.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注植被冠层空间异质性对太阳诱导叶绿素荧光（SIF）的影响，以及如何利用模型来量化这种影响。研究使用了三维离散各向异性辐射传输（DART）模型来模拟SIF，并比较了均质和异质冠层之间的差异。研究重点在于冠层结构如何影响SIF的产生和传输，以及如何利用植被指数（VIs）来校正由于冠层异质性引起的SIF估算误差。虽然SIF可以作为植被光合作用的指标，但该研究并没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术的关联性较弱。
authors: Liang Zhao;Rui Sun
title: Evaluating the impact of canopy spatial heterogeneity on Solar-Induced chlorophyll fluorescence and Model-Based quantification
abstract:
•Heterogeneous and homogeneous canopy SIF show clear differences under the same LAI. •Escape probability adjusts canopy-top SIF to leaf SIF, reducing angular bias. •Canopy structure regulates canopy-top SIF via NIRv, while leaf SIF depends onfAPAR. •The CV of NIRv and EVI adjusts homogeneous SIF to match heterogeneous SIF. 
 Solar-induced chlorophyll fluorescence (SIF) is a powerful proxy for vegetation photosynthesis. However, its broader application remains constrained by the insufficient understanding and quantification of canopy spatial heterogeneity. We used the 3D discrete anisotropic radiative transfer (DART) model to simulate SIF. Heterogeneous and homogeneous canopies were compared to quantify the impact of canopy spatial configuration on total leaf-emitted SIF (SIFtotal) and hemispherically integrated top-of-canopy SIF (SIFhemi). Angular effects were examined by comparing top-of-canopy SIF (SIFtoc) with SIFtotal estimated at different viewing angles. We also compared the relationships of simulated SIFtotal and SIFtoc with fraction of absorbed photosynthetically active radiation (fAPAR) and vegetation indices (VIs). In addition, we evaluated the relationships between the coefficient of variation (CV) of VIs and SIF, and developed a correction function for estimating heterogeneous-canopy SIF using homogeneous-canopy SIF. The results reveal that (1) both SIFtotal and SIFhemi are significantly higher in homogeneous than in heterogeneous canopies; (2) estimating SIFtotal from SIFtoc effectively reduces angular dependency; (3) SIFtotal exhibits the strongest correlation with fAPAR, while SIFtoc aligns better with NIRv and EVI; and (4) VI-derived CVs are negatively correlated with SIF, with CVNIRv and CVEVI at 10 m resolution demonstrating robust performance in fitting the ratio of heterogeneous-to-homogeneous canopy SIF, validating the proposed correction function. This study highlights the critical role of canopy structural heterogeneity in shaping SIF and presents an approach to convert homogeneous-canopy SIF to heterogeneous-canopy conditions, offering a novel pathway toward more accurate SIF estimation and application.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注植被光学厚度（VOD）的遥感反演，特别是利用微波遥感技术和C波段数据，结合AMSR-E、AMSR2和WindSat等多个传感器的观测数据，旨在创建一个长期的、一致的C波段VOD数据集。该研究主要应用于植被状况监测，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、大气成分分析等）关联性不强，虽然遥感数据可能受到大气的影响，但研究重点在于地表植被而非大气本身。
authors: Dongbo Chen;Lei Fan;Jian Peng;Gabrielle De Lannoy;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Frédéric Frappart;Shengli Tao;Mengjia Wang;Xiaojun Li;Xiangzhuo Liu;Huan Wang;Qiangqiang Yuan;Xiuzhi Chen;Yao Xiao;Philippe Ciais
title: A global long-term (2002–2022) C-band vegetation optical depth record retrieved after merging AMSR-E, AMSR2 and WindSat
abstract:
•Proposed a calibration method for merging TB observations from three sensors. •Assessed the long-term C-VOD retrieved from the merged TB. •The long-term C-VOD was found to be highly consistent over three sensors. 
 Vegetation optical depth (VOD) based on microwave remote sensing has become an essential indicator for monitoring large-scale vegetation conditions. The relatively long-term record of satellite-based passive C-band observations offers the potential for assessing dynamic vegetation changes. Due to the limited operational lifetime of individual microwave sensors, retrieving a long-term C-band VOD (C-VOD) dataset often requires combining multiple sensors, such as Advanced Microwave Scanning Radiometer for EOS Aqua (AMSR-E, 2002–2011), Advanced Microwave Scanning Radiometer 2 (AMSR2, 2012–present) and WindSat (2003–2020). Retrieving a long-term C-VOD from their C-band brightness temperature (TB) observations faces two major challenges: (i) non-negligible systematic biases exist between the TB observations among the three sensors; (ii) TB from different sensors may not be strongly associated, especially in tropical forests with small seasonal variations. To address these challenges, we employed a combined inter-calibration method, using linear regression in sparse vegetation and linear rescaling in dense vegetation, to merge TB from three sensors. Results showed that: (i) in undisturbed dense forests where minimal emissivity variation can be assumed, the merged TB (2002–2022) exhibited strong temporal correlations with skin temperature (H polarization: R = 0.90, V polarization: R = 0.86); (ii) the merged C-VOD retrieved from the merged TB exhibited substantially improved temporal consistency across three sensors, reducing global discrepancies between AMSR-E and AMSR2 from 6.20 % to 0.34 %. Furthermore, the merged C-VOD showed stable long-term consistency across sensors, with paired t-tests indicating no significant differences (P-value > 0.01) at the global and vegetation-type scales, confirming reliable cross-sensor continuity; (iii) the merged C-VOD showed stronger temporal correlations with normalized difference vegetation index, enhanced vegetation index, and site-level gross primary production across more vegetated areas globally, and exhibited higher and more stable spatial correlations with vegetation variables across sensor transitions compared to the existing merged C-VOD product.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 这篇论文主要关注的是人-机器人协同的激光雷达-惯性导航同步定位与地图构建（LiDAR-inertial SLAM）系统，特别是针对异构平台（如头盔式和无人地面车辆UGV）的协同建图。论文提出了一种新的基于稳定三角描述子的地点识别方法，用于检测不同视场之间的重叠，并利用共轭平面基元进行地图优化。实验结果表明，该系统在多种环境下均优于其他SLAM框架。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联。
authors: Yangzi Cong;Chi Chen;Tianhe Xu;Wenfeng Nie;Zhen Zhang;Sen Wang;Linghan Yao;Bisheng Yang
title: HRCM: Human–Robot LiDAR-inertial collaborative mapping with robust triangulated planes
abstract:
•A Delaunay Constrained STD place recognition method is proposed to efficiently retrieve revisited places. Local and global similarity are sufficiently encoded for reliable loop closure and transformation estimation. •A novel collaborative mapping system is elaborately integrated with bundle adjustment of conjugated plane primitives to optimize mutual consistency across heterogeneous platforms. •Abundant field tests with various settings are carried out to validate the performance of our system with heterogeneous helmet-based and UGV-based platform, showing considerable superiority compared to current famous frameworks. 
 Multirobot Simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) has become a hot spot all over the world while there still exist some key issues to be addressed for collaborative mapping, especially for heterogenous platforms. This paper presents a self-designed LiDAR-inertial-mapping system on lightweight manned helmet and unmanned ground vehicle (UGV) platforms. A stable-triangular-descriptor-based place recognition method is proposed to detect overlap between varied field of view (FoV), followed by a Delaunay verification to restrain the global similarity. Based on the conjugated plane primitives across the platforms, bundle adjustment is derived to enhance the map consistency. All frames within the sliding window will be mutually constrained and optimized through the collective pose graph. Experiments on place recognition, pose estimation and point cloud mapping are conducted in different kinds of environments. Compared to other famous works (e.g. FastLIO2, LIOSAM, PointLIO), our system can attain the best results in almost all cases. The final improvements against them of mapping precision reach 15.71% with same LiDAR and 14.49% for heterogenous LiDARs on UGV. As for the helmet, this disparity varies from 0.6% for dataset with small intersection to 22.33% at most.

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 该论文主要关注利用遥感技术进行水稻种植强度的半自动制图，特别是在中国南方地区。研究重点在于区分水稻与其他作物，并准确绘制水稻种植区域的分布图，以服务于产量估计、粮食政策制定和水资源管理。论文中使用的遥感数据主要来自MODIS和Sentinel系列卫星，用于分析植被指数和作物生长周期。虽然论文使用了遥感数据，但其核心内容与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、大气成分分析等）无关。
authors: Liangli Meng;Long Yu;Yunfei Li;Ruoque Shen;Wenping Yuan;Yong Xie;Jun Li;Li Zhuo;Antonio Plaza
title: Semi-automatic paddy rice intensity mapping for southern China with multiple cropping systems
abstract:
•A new semi-automatic paddy rice intensity mapping framework is proposed. •This framework applies to diverse climatic and geographical conditions. •A rice feature set is developed by considering multiple phenological stages. •An automated method for dividing the growing season is proposed. 
 Accurate paddy rice cropping intensity (PRCI) information is crucial for yield estimation, food policy formulation, and water resources management. However, the high cultivation intensity, fragmented farmland, complex crop rotation systems, and overlapping crop growth stages in southern China make it challenging to differentiate rice varieties from other crops. To address this limitation, we propose a semi-automatic framework for mapping PRCI in southern China. This framework first fused MODIS and Sentinel-2 data to generate high-spatiotemporal-resolution vegetation indices, forming the data foundation to identify the key phenological stages of paddy rice. Then, an automated division approach is designed to divide crop-growing seasons. Based on that, we developed a discriminant feature set for rice and identified potential rice-planting regions using an unsupervised Gaussian mixture model. Finally, we obtained reliable 10-m PRCI maps from PRP regions by integrating statistical data, Sentinel-1 data, limited rice samples, and the time-weighted dynamic time warping algorithm. Experimental results showed that our framework consistently achieved a high mapping accuracy of 87 % across various regions with diverse landforms and agricultural practices. Furthermore, the framework showed a strong correlation with municipal-level statistical data (R2 = 0.99) and ideal adaptability to complex landscapes and crop rotation systems.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注室内环境中半挥发性有机化合物（SVOCs），特别是邻苯二甲酸酯（phthalates）在气相和颗粒相之间的分配行为，以及空气交换率（AER）对这种分配的影响。研究通过实验测量了邻苯二甲酸二丁酯（DnBP）和邻苯二甲酸二乙酯（DEP）在无机氯化钠（NaCl）颗粒上的分配系数（Kp），并探讨了AER对Kp的影响。研究结果表明，DnBP的Kp值高于DEP，且Kp值与混合时间呈正相关。较高的AER会导致较低的颗粒相SVOCs浓度。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）关联不大，主要集中在室内空气质量和通风策略对SVOCs行为的影响。
authors: Azad Bahrami;Fariborz Haghighat;Jiping Zhu;Jianjun Niu
title: Influence of residence time on the particle-gas partitioning of phthalates onto airborne inorganic particle
abstract:
•The gaseous DnBP and DEP were generated in a quasi-stable system. •DnBP possessed higher Kpthan DEP due to its lower vapor pressure. •Higher AER led to lower SVOCs particle-phase concentration. 
 In indoor environments, the presence of particulate matter promotes SVOCs volatilization, increasing their overall concentration in the air. This effect arises from the partition of SVOCs between the gas and particulate phases. The particle-gas partition ratio (Kp) is a critical parameter influencing the fate, transport, and human exposure to indoor SVOCs. Air exchange rate (AER) is a pivotal factor in closed spaces as it regulates the residence time of airborne SVOCs in an indoor environment. It has been reported that AER (or residence time) can affect particle-gas partitioning behavior for organic particles when equilibrium between gas and particle phases is not reached; however, its effect on inorganic particles has not been thoroughly investigated. This study develops an experimental procedure to measure Kp of Di-n-butyl phthalate (DnBP) and Diethyl phthalate (DEP) with inorganic sodium chloride (NaCl) particles. Results shows that DnBP had higher Kp values than DEP. Positive correlation of Kp values and mixing time was observed. These findings are consistent with model predictions. Further experiments were carried out to study the impact of AER on Kp, and the results shown that higher air exchange rates (lower residence time) result in lower particle-phase concentrations of SVOCs due to increased dilution and reduced interaction time with particles. These findings have important implications for indoor air quality assessments, highlighting the influence of ventilation strategies on SVOCs behavior in indoor environments.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注中国地区湿热浪的强度和变化趋势。它使用均一化的湿球温度数据，通过累积强度来量化湿热浪的严重程度。研究发现，经过均一化处理后，湿热浪的强度显著增加，尤其是在1990年之后。论文强调了观测数据均一化对于准确评估湿热浪风险的重要性。虽然该研究涉及大气温度和湿度的分析，但它主要侧重于气候变化和极端天气事件的影响，与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）的直接关联较弱。
topic_words: ['wet-bulb temperature', 'humid heatwaves', 'homogenized data', 'cumulative intensity', 'air temperature', 'relative humidity']
authors: Linghong Chen;Hongze Cai;Changjian Yin;Kaicun Wang
title: Stronger rise in humid heatwaves over China shown by homogenized data from 1961 to 2022
abstract:
•A homogenized, high-resolution (0.1° × 0.1°) wet-bulb temperature dataset is used to quantified humid heatwaves. •Humid heatwave severity is characterized using cumulative intensity, demonstrating higher positive trend (1.71 °C/decade) than unhomogenized heatwave (1.29 °C/decade). •After homogenization, the humid heatwave severity increased by 26.6 % during 2010–2022. 
 A growing body of evidence has established the intensification of global humid heatwaves. With a large population and diverse ecosystem, humid heatwave in China has garnered scientific attention. Divergent conclusions across previous research of humid heatwave severity stem from the variations in wet-bulb temperature data source and heatwave characteristics. Robust wet-bulb temperature with high spatiotemporal resolution and cumulative heatwave characteristics, would enable more consistent assessments of humid heatwaves. Here, we generate regular gridded data of wet-bulb temperature, based on homogenized air temperature and relative humidity from station observational records across China. Meanwhile, we propose a cumulative heatwave intensity characteristic to quantify humid heatwaves severity, with inter-annual and cross-regional comparisons. The homogenized cumulative intensity characteristic reveals a significant increasing trend from 1961 to 2022. The national time-averaged value of the cumulative intensity during 1990–2022 (8.11 °C) exceeds twice the value of 1961–1990 (2.94 °C). The analysis identifies the Tibetan Plateau and Northwestern China as hotspots for humid heatwaves. These regions exhibit both higher multi-year mean severity and stronger intensification trends. The homogenization procedure reveals more extensive regions across China exhibiting both stronger and statistically significant intensification trends in heatwave severity. Additionally, the homogenized national mean trend of cumulative intensity of humid heatwave (1.71 °C/decade) surpass that derived from unhomogenized data (1.29 °C/decade). The cumulative intensity of humid heatwaves exhibits considerable discrepancy after homogenization, especially in post-1990. The relative discrepancy reaches 26.6 % during 2010–2022, while partial homogenization of temperature contributes − 9.3 %, partial homogenization of relative humidity contributes 48.0 %. This study investigates the rapid intensification of humid heatwaves across China under global warming, while highlighting how observational inhomogeneity systematically underestimate associated risks.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注华北雨季期间的强降水特征以及NCEP S2S模型的预测能力。论文将华北地区的强降水分为两类，并分析了不同类型强降水形成的原因，以及NCEP S2S模型对不同类型强降水的预测技巧。研究发现，模型对第一类强降水（集中在京津冀地区）的预测技巧较低，主要是因为模型未能准确预测西太平洋副热带高压（WPSH）的北抬。而对于第二类强降水（发生在华北南部），模型具有较高的预测技巧，这归因于其能够预测南亚高压（SAH）的东伸。该研究与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）没有直接关联，主要侧重于气象学和气候预测。
topic_words: ['heavy rainfall', 'North China rainy season', 'precipitation forecast', 'WPSH', 'SAH', 'NCEP S2S model']
authors: Ting Zheng;Zhihai Zheng;Peiyi Fan;Xintong Hou;Guolin Feng
title: The characteristics of heavy rainfall during the rainy season over North China and prediction skill of NCEP S2S
abstract:
•The heavy rainfall in North China are divided into two types: one type is concentrated in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region, while the other occurs in southern North China. •The first type of heavy rainfall is mainly due to the PJ pattern strengthening the WPSH. The second type is due to the eastward extension of the SAH. •The low forecast skill of the NCEP S2S for the first type is primarily because the model fails to predict the WPSH. The model exhibits higher forecasting skill for the second type and the SAH. 
 The North China region is one of the most core areas in China. Understanding the characteristics of heavy precipitation during the North China rainy season is of great significance for predicting and preventing flood disasters in this region. Precipitation in North China in 2024 ranked fourth in the past 45 years. Therefore, we conducted a study of the precipitation in North China in 2024 and found that the precipitation anomaly center was located in the eastern part of North China. Based on this, we conducted an analysis of the distribution characteristics of heavy rainfall of North China and found that it can be divided into two types: one type of heavy rainfall is concentrated in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, while the other occurs in southern North China. Heavy rainfall concentrated in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region is mainly due to the descending branch of the Pacific-Japan (PJ) pattern coinciding with the center of the Western Pacific Subtropical High (WPSH), thereby strengthening the northward-jumping WPSH. The low forecast skill of the National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP) Sub-seasonal to Seasonal (S2S) model for the first type of heavy rainfall is primarily because the model fails to predict the northward shift of the WPSH, leading to a southern bias in the forecasted anomaly center. Heavy rainfall occurring in the southern part of North China is due to the eastward extension of the eastern boundary of the South Asian High (SAH), which brings a large amount of moisture and strengthens the WPSH. The NCEP S2S model exhibits modestly higher forecasting skill for the second type of heavy rainfall compared to the first, attributed to its ability to predict the eastward extension of the SAH. The 2024 precipitation anomaly in North China aligns more closely with a hybrid of the first and second rainfall types. This pattern correlates with an unusually intense and northward-displaced WPSH, coupled with an exceptionally eastward-extended eastern boundary of the SAH. Consequently, the model successfully predicted the precipitation anomaly in southeastern North China but exhibited limited skill in forecasting anomalies across the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region.
